border	Sets all the border properties in one declaration		1	border: border-width border-style border-color|initial|inherit;		&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>p {<br>    border: 5px solid red;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;This is some text in a paragraph.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;	Background and Border Properties	
border-bottom	Sets all the bottom border properties in one declaration		1	border-bottom: border-width border-style border-color|initial|inherit;		&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>p  {<br>    border-style: solid;<br>    border-bottom: thick dotted #ff0000;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;This is some text in a paragraph.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;	Background and Border Properties	
border-bottom-color	Sets the color of the bottom border		1	border-bottom-color: color|transparent|initial|inherit;		&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>p  {<br>    border-style: solid;<br>    border-bottom-color: #ff0000;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;This is some text in a paragraph.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;	Background and Border Properties	
border-bottom-left-radius	Defines the shape of the border of the bottom-left corner		3	border-bottom-left-radius: length|% [length|%]|initial|inherit;		&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt; <br>div {<br>    border: 2px solid;<br>    padding: 10px;<br>    background: #dddddd;<br>    border-bottom-left-radius: 2em;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;div&gt;The border-bottom-left-radius property allows you to add a rounded border to the bottom-left corner.&lt;/div&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;	Background and Border Properties	
border-bottom-right-radius	Defines the shape of the border of the bottom-right corner		3	border-bottom-right-radius: length|% [length|%]|initial|inherit;		&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt; <br>div {<br>    border: 2px solid;<br>    padding: 10px;<br>    background: #dddddd;<br>    border-bottom-right-radius: 2em;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;div&gt;The border-bottom-right-radius property allows you to add a rounded border to the bottom-right corner.&lt;/div&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;	Background and Border Properties	
border-bottom-style	Sets the style of the bottom border		1	border-bottom-style:none|hidden|dotted|dashed|solid|double|groove|ridge|inset|outset|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>p {border-style: solid;}<br><br>p.none {border-bottom-style: none;}<br>p.dotted {border-bottom-style: dotted;}<br>p.dashed {border-bottom-style: dashed;}<br>p.solid {border-bottom-style: solid;}<br>p.double {border-bottom-style: double;}<br>p.groove {border-bottom-style: groove;}<br>p.ridge {border-bottom-style: ridge;}<br>p.inset {border-bottom-style: inset;}<br>p.outset {border-bottom-style: outset;}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p class=""none""&gt;No bottom border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""dotted""&gt;A dotted bottom border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""dashed""&gt;A dashed bottom border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""solid""&gt;A solid bottom border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""double""&gt;A double bottom border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""groove""&gt;A groove bottom border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""ridge""&gt;A ridge bottom border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""inset""&gt;An inset bottom border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""outset""&gt;An outset bottom border.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Background and Border Properties	
border-bottom-width	Sets the width of the bottom border		1	border-bottom-width: medium|thin|thick|length|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>p  {<br>    border-style: solid;<br>    border-bottom-width: 15px;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; The ""border-bottom-width"" property does not work if it is used alone. Use the ""border-style"" property to set the borders first.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Background and Border Properties	
border-color	Sets the color of the four borders		1	border-color: color|transparent|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>p.one {<br>    border-style: solid;<br>    border-color: #0000ff;<br>}<br><br>p.two {<br>    border-style: solid;<br>    border-color: #ff0000 #0000ff;<br>}<br><br>p.three {<br>    border-style: solid;<br>    border-color: #ff0000 #00ff00 #0000ff;<br>}<br><br>p.four {<br>    border-style: solid;<br>    border-color: #ff0000 #00ff00 #0000ff rgb(250,0,255);<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p class=""one""&gt;One-colored border!&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""two""&gt;Two-colored border!&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""three""&gt;Three-colored border!&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""four""&gt;Four-colored border!&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; The ""border-color"" property does not work if it is used alone. Use the ""border-style"" property to set the borders first.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Background and Border Properties	
border-image	A shorthand property for setting all the border-image-* properties		3	border-image: source slice width outset repeat|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt; <br>    border: 10px solid transparent;<br>    padding: 15px;<br>    -webkit-border-image: url(border.png) 30 round; /* Safari 3.1-5 */<br>    -o-border-image: url(border.png) 30 round; /* Opera 11-12.1 */<br>    border-image: url(border.png) 30 round;<br>}<br><br>    border: 10px solid transparent;<br>    padding: 15px;<br>    -webkit-border-image: url(border.png) 30 stretch; /* Safari 3.1-5 */<br>    -o-border-image: url(border.png) 30 stretch; /* Opera 11-12.1 */<br>    border-image: url(border.png) 30 stretch;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;The border-image property specifies an image to be used as the border around an element:&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p id=""borderimg1""&gt;Here, the middle sections of the image are repeated to create the border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p id=""borderimg2""&gt;Here, the middle sections of the image are stretched to create the border.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;Here is the original image:&lt;/p&gt;&lt;img src=""border.png""&gt;<br>&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Note:&lt;/strong&gt; Internet Explorer 10, and earlier versions, do not support the border-image property.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Background and Border Properties	
border-image-outset	Specifies the amount by which the border image area extends beyond the border box		3	border-image-outset: length|number|initial|inherit;			Background and Border Properties	
border-image-repeat	Specifies whether the border image should be repeated, rounded or stretched		3	border-image-repeat: stretch|repeat|round|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt; <br>    border: 15px solid transparent;<br>    padding: 15px;<br>    border-image-source: url(border.png);<br>    border-image-repeat: repeat;<br>    border-image-slice: 30;<br>}<br><br>    border: 15px solid transparent;<br>    padding: 15px;<br>    border-image-source: url(border.png);<br>    border-image-repeat: round;<br>    border-image-slice: 30;<br>}<br><br>    border: 15px solid transparent;<br>    padding: 15px;<br>    border-image-source: url(border.png);<br>    border-image-repeat: stretch;    <br>    border-image-slice: 30;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;The border-image-repeat property specifies whether the border image should be repeated, rounded or stretched:&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p id=""borderimg1""&gt;border-image-repeat: repeat;&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p id=""borderimg2""&gt;border-image-repeat: round;&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p id=""borderimg3""&gt;border-image-repeat: stretched;&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;Here is the original image:&lt;/p&gt;&lt;img src=""border.png""&gt;<br>&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Note:&lt;/strong&gt; Internet Explorer 10, and earlier versions, do not support the border-image-repeat property.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Background and Border Properties	
border-image-slice	Specifies how to slice the border image		3	border-image-slice: number|%|fill|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>    border: 10px solid transparent;<br>    padding: 15px;<br>    -webkit-border-image: url(border.png) round; /* Safari 3.1-5 */<br>    -o-border-image: url(border.png) round; /* Opera 11-12.1 */<br>    border-image: url(border.png) round;<br>    border-image-slice: 50;<br>}<br><br>    border: 10px solid transparent;<br>    padding: 15px;<br>    -webkit-border-image: url(border.png) round; /* Safari 3.1-5 */<br>    -o-border-image: url(border.png) round; /* Opera 11-12.1 */<br>    border-image: url(border.png) round;<br>    border-image-slice: 20%;<br>}<br><br>    border: 10px solid transparent;<br>    padding: 15px;<br>    -webkit-border-image: url(border.png) round; /* Safari 3.1-5 */<br>    -o-border-image: url(border.png) round; /* Opera 11-12.1 */<br>    border-image: url(border.png) round;<br>    border-image-slice: 30%;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p id=""borderimg1""&gt;border-image-slice: 50;&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p id=""borderimg2""&gt;border-image-slice: 20%;&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p id=""borderimg3""&gt;border-image-slice: 30%;&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;Here is the image used:&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;img src=""border.png""&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Note:&lt;/strong&gt; Internet Explorer 10, and earlier versions, do not support the border-image-slice property.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Background and Border Properties	
border-image-source	Specifies the path to the image to be used as a border		3	border-image-source: none|image|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt; <br>    border: 10px solid transparent;<br>    padding: 15px;<br>    border-image-source: url(border.png);    <br>    border-image-slice: 30;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;The border-image-source property specifies the image to be used as the border around an element:&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p id=""borderimg""&gt;Hello World!&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;Here is the original image:&lt;/p&gt;&lt;img src=""border.png""&gt;<br>&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Note:&lt;/strong&gt; Internet Explorer 10, and earlier versions, do not support the border-image-source property.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Background and Border Properties	
border-image-width	Specifies the widths of the image-border		3	border-image-width: number|%|auto|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt; <br>    border: 10px solid transparent;<br>    padding: 15px;<br>    border-image-source: url(border.png);<br>    border-image-repeat: round;<br>    border-image-slice: 30;<br>    border-image-width: 10px;        <br>}<br><br>    border: 10px solid transparent;<br>    padding: 15px;<br>    border-image-source: url(border.png);<br>    border-image-repeat: round;<br>    border-image-slice: 30;<br>    border-image-width: 20px;        <br>}<br><br>    border: 10px solid transparent;<br>    padding: 15px;<br>    border-image-source: url(border.png);<br>    border-image-repeat: round;    <br>    border-image-slice: 30;<br>    border-image-width: 30px;        <br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;The border-image-width property specifies the width of the border image:&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p id=""borderimg1""&gt;border-image-width: 10px;&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p id=""borderimg2""&gt;border-image-width: 20px;&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p id=""borderimg3""&gt;border-image-width: 30px;&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;Here is the original image:&lt;/p&gt;&lt;img src=""border.png""&gt;<br>&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Note:&lt;/strong&gt; Internet Explorer 10, and earlier versions, do not support the border-image-width property.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Background and Border Properties	
border-left	Sets all the left border properties in one declaration		1	border-left: border-width border-style border-color|initial|inherit;		&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>p  {<br>    border-style: solid;<br>    border-left: thick double #ff0000;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;This is some text in a paragraph.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;	Background and Border Properties	
border-left-color	Sets the color of the left border		1	border-left-color: color|transparent|initial|inherit;		&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>p  {<br>    border-style: solid;<br>    border-left-color: #ff0000;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;This is some text in a paragraph.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;	Background and Border Properties	
border-left-style	Sets the style of the left border		1	border-left-style:none|hidden|dotted|dashed|solid|double|groove|ridge|inset|outset|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>p  {border-style: solid;}<br><br>p.none {border-left-style: none;}<br>p.dotted {border-left-style: dotted;}<br>p.dashed {border-left-style: dashed;}<br>p.solid {border-left-style: solid;}<br>p.double {border-left-style: double;}<br>p.groove {border-left-style: groove;}<br>p.ridge {border-left-style: ridge;}<br>p.inset {border-left-style: inset;}<br>p.outset {border-left-style: outset;}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p class=""none""&gt;No left border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""dotted""&gt;A dotted left border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""dashed""&gt;A dashed left border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""solid""&gt;A solid left border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""double""&gt;A double left border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""groove""&gt;A groove left border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""ridge""&gt;A ridge left border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""inset""&gt;An inset left border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""outset""&gt;An outset left border.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Background and Border Properties	
border-left-width	Sets the width of the left border		1	border-left-width: medium|thin|thick|length|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>p  {<br>    border-style: solid;<br>    border-left-width: 15px;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; The ""border-left-width"" property does not work if it is used alone. Use the ""border-style"" property to set the borders first.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Background and Border Properties	
border-radius	A shorthand property for setting all the four border-*-radius properties		3	border-radius: 1-4 length|% / 1-4 length|%|initial|inherit;		&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt; <br>div {<br>    border: 2px solid #a1a1a1;<br>    padding: 10px 40px; <br>    background: #dddddd;<br>    width: 300px;<br>    border-radius: 25px;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;div&gt;The border-radius property allows you to add rounded corners to elements.&lt;/div&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;	Background and Border Properties	
border-right	Sets all the right border properties in one declaration		1	border-right: border-width border-style border-color|initial|inherit;		&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>p  {<br>    border-style: solid;<br>    border-right: thick double #ff0000;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;This is some text in a paragraph.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;	Background and Border Properties

Use the ""border-style"" property to set the borders first.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Background and Border Properties	
border-style	Sets the style of the four borders		1	border-style:none|hidden|dotted|dashed|solid|double|groove|ridge|inset|outset|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>p.none {border-style: none;}<br>p.dotted {border-style: dotted;}<br>p.dashed {border-style: dashed;}<br>p.solid {border-style: solid;}<br>p.double {border-style: double;}<br>p.groove {border-style: groove;}<br>p.ridge {border-style: ridge;}<br>p.inset {border-style: inset;}<br>p.outset {border-style: outset;}<br>p.hidden {border-style: hidden;}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p class=""none""&gt;No border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""dotted""&gt;A dotted border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""dashed""&gt;A dashed border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""solid""&gt;A solid border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""double""&gt;A double border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""groove""&gt;A groove border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""ridge""&gt;A ridge border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""inset""&gt;An inset border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""outset""&gt;An outset border.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""hidden""&gt;A hidden border.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Background and Border Properties	
border-top	Sets all the top border properties in one declaration		1	border-top: border-width border-style border-color|initial|inherit;		&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>p {<br>    border-style: solid;<br>    border-top: thick double #ff0000;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;This is some text in a paragraph.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;	Background and Border Properties

border-top-left-radius	Defines the shape of the border of the top-left corner		3	border-top-left-radius: length|% [length|%]|initial|inherit;		&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt; <br>div {<br>    border: 2px solid;<br>    padding: 10px;<br>    background: #dddddd;<br>    border-top-left-radius: 2em;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;div&gt;The border-top-left-radius property allows you to add a rounded border to the top-left corner.&lt;/div&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;	Background and Border Properties

Use the ""border-style"" property to set the borders first.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Background and Border Properties	
border-width	Sets the width of the four borders		1	border-width: medium|thin|thick|length|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>p.one {<br>    border-style: solid;<br>    border-width: 5px;<br>}<br><br>p.two {<br>    border-style: solid;<br>    border-width: medium;<br>}<br><br>p.three {<br>    border-style: solid;<br>    border-width: 1px;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p class=""one""&gt;Some text.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""two""&gt;Some text.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""three""&gt;Some text.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; The ""border-width"" property does not work if it is used alone. Use the ""border-style"" property to set the borders first.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Background and Border Properties	
box-decoration-break	Sets the behaviour of the background and border of an element at page-break, or, for in-line elements, at line-break.		3				Background and Border Properties	
box-shadow	Attaches one or more drop-shadows to the box		3	box-shadow: none|h-shadow v-shadow blur spread color |inset|initial|inherit;		&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt; <br>div {<br>    width: 300px;<br>    height: 100px;<br>    background-color: yellow;<br>    box-shadow: 10px 10px 5px #888888;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;	Background and Border Properties	
bottom	Specifies the bottom position of a positioned element		2	bottom: auto|length|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>div.relative {<br>    position: relative;<br>    width: 400px;<br>    height: 200px;<br>    border: 3px solid #8AC007;<br>}<br><br>div.absolute {<br>    position: absolute;<br>    bottom: 70px;<br>    width: 200px;<br>    height: 100px;<br>    border: 3px solid #8AC007;<br>} <br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;div class=""relative""&gt;This div element has position: relative;<br>  &lt;div class=""absolute""&gt;This div element has position: absolute. It is placed 70 pixels above the bottom edge of the  containing positioned element (div with class=""relative"").&lt;/div&gt;<br>&lt;/div&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Basic Box Properties	
clear	Specifies which sides of an element where other floating elements are not allowed		1	clear: none|left|right|both|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>img {<br>    float: left;<br>}<br><br>p.clear {<br>    clear: both;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;img src=""logocss.gif"" width=""95"" height=""84""&gt;<br>&lt;p&gt;This is some text. This is some text. This is some text. This is some text. This is some text. This is some text.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p class=""clear""&gt;This is also some text. This is also some text. This is also some text. This is also some text. This is also some text. This is also some text.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Remove the ""clear"" class to see the effect.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Basic Box Properties	
clip	Clips an absolutely positioned element		2	clip: auto|shape|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>img {<br>    position: absolute;<br>    clip: rect(0px,60px,200px,0px);<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;img src=""w3css.gif"" width=""100"" height=""140""&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Basic Box Properties	
display	Specifies how a certain HTML element should be displayed		1	display: value;		&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>p {<br>    display: inline;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;This is a paragraph.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p&gt;This is a paragraph.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p&gt;This is a paragraph.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p&gt;This is a paragraph.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p&gt;This is a paragraph.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;	Basic Box Properties	
float	Specifies whether or not a box should float		1	float: none|left|right|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>img {<br>    float: right;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;In the paragraph below, we have added an image with style &lt;b&gt;float:right&lt;/b&gt;. The result is that the image will float to the right in the paragraph.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p&gt;<br>&lt;img src=""logocss.gif"" width=""95"" height=""84"" /&gt;<br>This is some text. This is some text. This is some text.<br>This is some text. This is some text. This is some text.<br>This is some text. This is some text. This is some text.<br>This is some text. This is some text. This is some text.<br>This is some text. This is some text. This is some text.<br>This is some text. This is some text. This is some text.<br>This is some text. This is some text. This is some text.<br>&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Basic Box Properties

overflow	Specifies what happens if content overflows an element's box		2	overflow: visible|hidden|scroll|auto|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>div.scroll {<br>    background-color: #00FFFF;<br>    width: 100px;<br>    height: 100px;<br>    overflow: scroll;<br>}<br><br>div.hidden {<br>    background-color: #00FF00;<br>    width: 100px;<br>    height: 100px;<br>    overflow: hidden;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;The overflow property specifies what to do if the content of an element exceeds the size of the element's box.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;overflow:scroll&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;div class=""scroll""&gt;You can use the overflow property when you want to have better control of the layout. The default value is visible.&lt;/div&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;overflow:hidden&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;div class=""hidden""&gt;You can use the overflow property when you want to have better control of the layout. The default value is visible.&lt;/div&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Basic Box Properties	
overflow-x	Specifies whether or not to clip the left/right edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area		3	overflow-x: visible|hidden|scroll|auto|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt; <br>div {<br>    width: 110px;<br>    height: 110px;<br>    border: thin solid black;<br>    overflow-x: hidden;<br>    overflow-y: hidden;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;div&gt;&lt;p style=""width:140px""&gt;<br>In my younger and more vulnerable years my father gave me some advice that I've been turning over in my mind ever since.<br>'Whenever you feel like criticizing anyone,' he told me, 'just remember that all the people in this world haven't had the advantages that you've had.' <br>&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;Overflow-x specifies whether or not to clip the left/right edges of the content.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p&gt;Overflow-y specifies whether or not to clip the top/bottom edges of the content.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Basic Box Properties	
overflow-y	Specifies whether or not to clip the top/bottom edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area		3	overflow-y: visible|hidden|scroll|auto|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt; <br>div {<br>    width: 110px;<br>    height: 110px;<br>    border: thin solid black;<br>    overflow-x: hidden;<br>    overflow-y: hidden;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;div&gt;&lt;p style=""width:140px""&gt;<br>In my younger and more vulnerable years my father gave me some advice that I've been turning over in my mind ever since.<br>'Whenever you feel like criticizing anyone,' he told me, 'just remember that all the people in this world haven't had the advantages that you've had.' <br>&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;Overflow-x specifies whether or not to clip the left/right edges of the content.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p&gt;Overflow-y specifies whether or not to clip the top/bottom edges of the content.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Basic Box Properties	
padding	Sets all the padding properties in one declaration		1	padding: length|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>p.ex1 {<br>    padding: 2cm;<br>}<br><br>p.ex2 {<br>    padding: 0.5cm 3cm;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p class=""ex1""&gt;This text has equal padding on each side. The padding on each side is 2cm.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;p class=""ex2""&gt;This text has a top and bottom padding of 0.5cm and a left and right padding of 3cm.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Basic Box Properties

position	Specifies the type of positioning method used for an element (static, relative, absolute or fixed)		2	position: static|absolute|fixed|relative|initial|inherit;		&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>h2 {<br>    position: absolute;<br>    left: 100px;<br>    top: 150px;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;h2&gt;This is a heading with an absolute position&lt;/h2&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;With absolute positioning, an element can be placed anywhere on a page. width	Sets the width of an element		1	width: auto|value|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>img.normal {<br>    height: auto;<br>}<br><br>img.big {<br>    height: 120px;<br>}<br><br>p.ex {<br>    height: 100px;<br>    width: 100px;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;img class=""normal"" src=""logocss.gif"" width=""95"" height=""84""&gt;&lt;br&gt;<br>&lt;img class=""big"" src=""logocss.gif"" width=""95"" height=""84""&gt;<br><br>&lt;p class=""ex""&gt;The height and width of this paragraph is 100px.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p&gt;This is some text in a paragraph. This is some text in a paragraph.<br>This is some text in a paragraph. This is some text in a paragraph.<br>This is some text in a paragraph. This is some text in a paragraph.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Basic Box Properties	
vertical-align	Sets the vertical alignment of an element		1	vertical-align: baseline|length|sub|super|top|text-top|middle|bottom|text-bottom|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>img.top {<br>    vertical-align: text-top;<br>}<br><br>img.bottom {<br>    vertical-align: text-bottom;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;An &lt;img src=""w3schools_logo.gif"" alt=""W3Schools"" width=""270"" height=""50"" /&gt; image with a default alignment.&lt;/p&gt; <br><br>&lt;p&gt;An &lt;img class=""top"" src=""w3schools_logo.gif"" alt=""W3Schools"" width=""270"" height=""50"" /&gt; image with a text-top alignment.&lt;/p&gt; <br><br>&lt;p&gt;An &lt;img class=""bottom"" src=""w3schools_logo.gif"" alt=""W3Schools"" width=""270"" height=""50"" /&gt; image with a text-bottom alignment.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Basic Box Properties	
z-index	Sets the stack order of a positioned element		2	z-index: auto|number|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br />&lt;html&gt;<br />&lt;head&gt;<br />&lt;style&gt;<br />img {<br />    position: absolute;<br />    left: 0px;<br />    top: 0px;<br />    z-index: -1;<br />}<br />&lt;/style&gt;<br />&lt;/head&gt;<br />&lt;body&gt;<br /><br />&lt;h1&gt;This is a heading&lt;/h1&gt;<br /><br />&lt;img src=""w3css.gif"" width=""100"" height=""140""&gt;<br /><br />&lt;p&gt;Because the image has a z-index of -1, it will be placed behind the text.&lt;/p&gt;<br /><br />&lt;/body&gt;<br />&lt;/html&gt;"	Basic Box Properties	
align-content	Specifies the alignment between the lines inside a flexible container when the items do not use all available space	<div>Многострочное выравнивание.</div><div>Свойство выравнивает строки flex-элементов по вертикали во flex-контейнере, позволяя управлять свободным пространством.</div><div>Свойство работает только в случае, если разрешен перенос строк и указано направление flex-flow: row/row-reverse/column/column-reverse wrap/wrap-reverse; и высота flex-контейнера. Не наследуется.</div>	3	align-content: stretch|center|flex-start|flex-end|space-between|space-around|initial|inherit;		"<div>&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</div><div>&lt;html&gt;</div><div>&lt;head&gt;</div><div>&lt;style&gt;&nbsp;</div><div>#main {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; width: 70px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; height: 300px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; border: 1px solid #c3c3c3;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: -webkit-flex;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: flex;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -webkit-flex-wrap: wrap;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; flex-wrap: wrap;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -webkit-align-content: center;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; align-content: center;</div><div>}</div><div><br /></div><div>#main div {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; width: 70px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; height: 70px;</div><div>}</div><div>&lt;/style&gt;</div><div>&lt;/head&gt;</div><div>&lt;body&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;div id=""main""&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:coral;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightblue;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:pink;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&lt;/div&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Internet Explorer 10 and earlier versions do not support the align-content property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Safari 7.0 to 9.0 supports an alternative, the -webkit-align-content property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;/body&gt;</div><div>&lt;/html&gt;</div>"	Flexible Box Layout	
align-items	Specifies the alignment for items inside a flexible container	<div>Выравнивание элементов по вертикали.</div>Свойство выравнивает flex-элементы, в том числе и анонимные flex-элементы по перпендикулярной оси (по высоте). Не наследуется.	3	align-items: stretch|center|flex-start|flex-end|baseline|initial|inherit;		"<div>&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</div><div>&lt;html&gt;</div><div>&lt;head&gt;</div><div>&lt;style&gt;&nbsp;</div><div>#main {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; width: 220px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; height: 300px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; border: 1px solid black;&nbsp;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: -webkit-flex; /* Safari */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -webkit-align-items: center; /* Safari 7.0+ */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: flex;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; align-items: center;</div><div>}</div><div><br /></div><div>#main div {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp;-webkit-flex: 1; /* Safari 6.1+ */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp;flex: 1;</div><div>}</div><div>&lt;/style&gt;</div><div>&lt;/head&gt;</div><div>&lt;body&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;div id=""main""&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:coral;""&gt;RED&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightblue;""&gt;BLUE&lt;/div&gt; &nbsp;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightgreen;""&gt;Green div with more content.&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&lt;/div&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Internet Explorer 10 and earlier versions do not support the align-items property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Safari 7.0 to 9.0 supports an alternative, the -webkit-align-items property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;/body&gt;</div><div>&lt;/html&gt;</div>"	Flexible Box Layout	
align-self	Specifies the alignment for selected items inside a flexible container	Выравнивание отдельных элементов.<div>Свойство отвечает за выравнивание отдельно взятого flex-элемента по высоте flex-контейнера. Переопределяет выравнивание, заданное align-items. Не наследуется.</div>	3	align-self: auto|stretch|center|flex-start|flex-end|baseline|initial|inherit;		"<div>&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</div><div>&lt;html&gt;</div><div>&lt;head&gt;</div><div>&lt;style&gt;&nbsp;</div><div>#main {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; width: 220px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; height: 300px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; border: 1px solid black;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: -webkit-flex; /* Safari */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -webkit-align-items: flex-start; /* Safari 7.0+ */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: flex;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; align-items: flex-start;</div><div>}</div><div><br /></div><div>#main div {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -webkit-flex: 1; /* Safari 6.1+ */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; flex: 1;</div><div>}</div><div><br /></div><div>#myBlueDiv {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -webkit-align-self: center; /* Safari 7.0+ */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; align-self: center;</div><div>}</div><div>&lt;/style&gt;</div><div>&lt;/head&gt;</div><div>&lt;body&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;div id=""main""&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:coral;""&gt;RED&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightblue;"" id=""myBlueDiv""&gt;BLUE&lt;/div&gt; &nbsp;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightgreen;""&gt;Green div with more content.&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&lt;/div&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; The align-self property overrides the container's align-items property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Internet Explorer 10 and earlier versions do not support the align-self property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Safari 7.0 to 9.0 supports an alternative, the -webkit-align-self property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;/body&gt;</div><div>&lt;/html&gt;</div>"	Flexible Box Layout	
flex	Specifies the length of the item, relative to the rest	<div>Задание базовой ширины и трансформации элемента одним свойством.</div><div>Свойство представляет собой сокращённую запись свойств flex-grow, flex-shrink и flex-basis. Значение по умолчанию: flex: 0 1 auto;. Можно указывать как одно, так и все три значения свойств. Свойство не наследуется.</div><div><br /></div><div>W3C рекомендует использовать сокращённую запись, так как она правильно сбрасывает любые неуказанные компоненты, чтобы подстроиться под типичное использование.</div>	3	flex: flex-grow flex-shrink flex-basis|auto|initial|inherit;		"<div>&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</div><div>&lt;html&gt;</div><div>&lt;head&gt;</div><div>&lt;style&gt;&nbsp;</div><div>#main {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; width: 220px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; height: 300px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; border: 1px solid black;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: -webkit-flex; /* Safari */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: flex;</div><div>}</div><div><br /></div><div>#main div {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -webkit-flex: 1; &nbsp;/* Safari 6.1+ */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -ms-flex: 1; &nbsp;/* IE 10 */ &nbsp; &nbsp;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; flex: 1;</div><div>}</div><div>&lt;/style&gt;</div><div>&lt;/head&gt;</div><div>&lt;body&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;div id=""main""&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:coral;""&gt;RED&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightblue;""&gt;BLUE&lt;/div&gt; &nbsp;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightgreen;""&gt;Green div with more content.&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&lt;/div&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Internet Explorer 9 and earlier versions do not support the flex property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Internet Explorer 10 supports an alternative, the -ms-flex property. IE11 and newer versions fully support the flex property (do not need the -ms- prefix).&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Safari 6.1 (and newer) supports an alternative, the -webkit-flex property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;/body&gt;</div><div>&lt;/html&gt;</div>"	Flexible Box Layout	
flex-basis	Specifies the initial length of a flexible item	Базовая ширина элемента.<div>Свойство позволяет задать базовую ширину flex-элемента, относительно которой будет происходить растяжение flex-grow или сужение flex-shrink элемента. Не наследуется.</div>	3	flex-basis: number|auto|initial|inherit;		"<div>&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</div><div>&lt;html&gt;</div><div>&lt;head&gt;</div><div>&lt;style&gt;</div><div>#main {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; width: 350px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; height: 100px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; border: 1px solid #c3c3c3;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: -webkit-flex; /* Safari */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: flex;</div><div>}</div><div><br /></div><div>#main div {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -webkit-flex-grow: 0; /* Safari 6.1+ */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -webkit-flex-shrink: 0; /* Safari 6.1+ */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -webkit-flex-basis: 40px; /* Safari 6.1+ */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; flex-grow: 0;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; flex-shrink: 0;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; flex-basis: 40px;</div><div>}</div><div><br /></div><div>#main div:nth-of-type(2) {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -webkit-flex-basis: 80px; /* Safari 6.1+ */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; flex-basis: 80px;</div><div>}</div><div>&lt;/style&gt;</div><div>&lt;/head&gt;</div><div>&lt;body&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;div id=""main""&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:coral;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightblue;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:khaki;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:pink;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightgrey;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&lt;/div&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Internet Explorer 10 and earlier versions do not support the flex-basis property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Safari 6.1 (and newer) supports an alternative, the -webkit-flex-basis property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;/body&gt;</div><div>&lt;/html&gt;</div>"	Flexible Box Layout	
flex-direction	Specifies the direction of the flexible items	Направление главной оси.<div>Свойство определяет, каким образом flex-элементы укладываются во flex-контейнере, задавая направление главной оси flex-контейнера. Они могут располагаться в двух главных направлениях — горизонтально, как строки и вертикально, как колонки. Главная ось по умолчанию идет слева направо. Поперечная – сверху вниз. Свойство не наследуется.</div>	3	flex-direction: row|row-reverse|column|column-reverse|initial|inherit;		"<div>&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</div><div>&lt;html&gt;</div><div>&lt;head&gt;</div><div>&lt;style&gt;&nbsp;</div><div>#main {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; width: 400px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; height: 400px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; border: 1px solid #c3c3c3;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: -webkit-flex; /* Safari */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -webkit-flex-direction: row-reverse; /* Safari 6.1+ */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: flex;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; flex-direction: row-reverse;</div><div>}</div><div><br /></div><div>#main div {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; width: 50px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; height: 50px;</div><div>}</div><div>&lt;/style&gt;</div><div>&lt;/head&gt;</div><div>&lt;body&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;div id=""main""&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:coral;""&gt;A&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightblue;""&gt;B&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:khaki;""&gt;C&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:pink;""&gt;D&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightgrey;""&gt;E&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightgreen;""&gt;F&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&lt;/div&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Internet Explorer 10 and earlier versions do not support the flex-direction property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Safari 6.1 (and newer) supports an alternative, the -webkit-flex-direction property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;/body&gt;</div><div>&lt;/html&gt;</div>"	Flexible Box Layout	
flex-flow	A shorthand property for the flex-direction and the flex-wrap properties	Краткая запись направления и многострочности.<div>Свойство предоставляет возможность в одном свойстве задать направление главной оси и многострочность поперечной оси, т.е. сокращённая запись свойств flex-direction и flex-wrap. Значение по умолчанию flex-flow: row nowrap;. Не наследуется.</div>	3	flex-flow: flex-direction flex-wrap|initial|inherit;		"<div>&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</div><div>&lt;html&gt;</div><div>&lt;head&gt;</div><div>&lt;style&gt;&nbsp;</div><div>#main {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; width: 200px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; height: 200px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; border: 1px solid #c3c3c3;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: -webkit-flex; /* Safari */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -webkit-flex-flow: row-reverse wrap; /* Safari 6.1+ */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: flex;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; flex-flow: row-reverse wrap;</div><div>}</div><div><br /></div><div>#main div {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; width: 50px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; height: 50px;</div><div>}</div><div>&lt;/style&gt;</div><div>&lt;/head&gt;</div><div>&lt;body&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;div id=""main""&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:coral;""&gt;A&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightblue;""&gt;B&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:khaki;""&gt;C&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:pink;""&gt;D&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightgrey;""&gt;E&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightgreen;""&gt;F&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&lt;/div&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Internet Explorer 10 and earlier versions do not support the flex-flow property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Safari 6.1 (and newer) supports an alternative, the -webkit-flex-flow property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;/body&gt;</div><div>&lt;/html&gt;</div>"	Flexible Box Layout	
flex-grow	Specifies how much the item will grow relative to the rest	Растяжение элементов.<div>Свойство определяет коэффициент увеличения ширины flex-элемента относительно других flex-элементов. Свойство не наследуется.</div>	3	flex-grow: number|initial|inherit;		"<div>&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</div><div>&lt;html&gt;</div><div>&lt;head&gt;</div><div>&lt;style&gt;</div><div>#main {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; width: 350px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; height: 100px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; border: 1px solid #c3c3c3;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: -webkit-flex; /* Safari */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: flex;</div><div>}</div><div><br /></div><div>/* Safari 6.1+ */</div><div>#main div:nth-of-type(1) {-webkit-flex-grow: 1;}</div><div>#main div:nth-of-type(2) {-webkit-flex-grow: 3;}</div><div>#main div:nth-of-type(3) {-webkit-flex-grow: 1;}</div><div>#main div:nth-of-type(4) {-webkit-flex-grow: 1;}</div><div>#main div:nth-of-type(5) {-webkit-flex-grow: 1;}</div><div><br /></div><div>/* Standard syntax */</div><div>#main div:nth-of-type(1) {flex-grow: 1;}</div><div>#main div:nth-of-type(2) {flex-grow: 3;}</div><div>#main div:nth-of-type(3) {flex-grow: 1;}</div><div>#main div:nth-of-type(4) {flex-grow: 1;}</div><div>#main div:nth-of-type(5) {flex-grow: 1;}</div><div>&lt;/style&gt;</div><div>&lt;/head&gt;</div><div>&lt;body&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;div id=""main""&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:coral;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightblue;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:khaki;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:pink;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightgrey;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&lt;/div&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Internet Explorer 10 and earlier versions do not support the flex-grow property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Safari 6.1 (and newer) supports an alternative, the -webkit-flex-grow property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;/body&gt;</div><div>&lt;/html&gt;</div>"	Flexible Box Layout	
flex-shrink	Specifies how the item will shrink relative to the rest	<div>Сужение элементов.</div>Свойство указывает коэффициент уменьшения ширины flex-элемента относительно других flex-элементов. Работает только если для элемента задана ширина с помощью свойства flex-basis или width. Свойство не наследуется.	3	flex-shrink: number|initial|inherit;		"<div>&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</div><div>&lt;html&gt;</div><div>&lt;head&gt;</div><div>&lt;style&gt;&nbsp;</div><div>#main {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; width: 350px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; height: 100px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; border: 1px solid #c3c3c3;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: -webkit-flex; /* Safari */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: flex;</div><div>}</div><div><br /></div><div>#main div {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -webkit-flex-grow: 1; /* Safari 6.1+ */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -webkit-flex-shrink: 1; /* Safari 6.1+ */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -webkit-flex-basis: 100px; /* Safari 6.1+ */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; flex-grow: 1;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; flex-shrink: 1;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; flex-basis: 100px;</div><div>}</div><div><br /></div><div>#main div:nth-of-type(2) {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -webkit-flex-shrink: 3; /* Safari 6.1+ */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; flex-shrink: 3;</div><div>}</div><div>&lt;/style&gt;</div><div>&lt;/head&gt;</div><div>&lt;body&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;div id=""main""&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:coral;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightblue;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:khaki;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:pink;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightgrey;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&lt;/div&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Internet Explorer 10 and earlier versions do not support the flex-shrink property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Safari 6.1 (and newer) supports an alternative, the -webkit-flex-shrink property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;/body&gt;</div><div>&lt;/html&gt;</div>"	Flexible Box Layout	
flex-wrap	Specifies whether the flexible items should wrap or not	Многострочность элементов.<div>Свойство управляет тем, как flex-контейнер будет выкладывать flex-элементы — в одну строку или в несколько, и направлением, в котором будут укладываться новые строки. По умолчанию flex-элементы укладываются в одну строку. При переполнении контейнера их содержимое будет выходить за границы flex-элементов. Не наследуется.</div>	3	flex-wrap: nowrap|wrap|wrap-reverse|initial|inherit;		"<div>&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</div><div>&lt;html&gt;</div><div>&lt;head&gt;</div><div>&lt;style&gt;&nbsp;</div><div>#main {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; width: 200px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; height: 200px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; border: 1px solid #c3c3c3;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: -webkit-flex; /* Safari */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -webkit-flex-wrap: wrap; /* Safari 6.1+ */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: flex;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; flex-wrap: wrap;</div><div>}</div><div><br /></div><div>#main div {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; width: 50px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; height: 50px;</div><div>}</div><div>&lt;/style&gt;</div><div>&lt;/head&gt;</div><div>&lt;body&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;div id=""main""&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:coral;""&gt;A&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightblue;""&gt;B&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:khaki;""&gt;C&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:pink;""&gt;D&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightgrey;""&gt;E&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightgreen;""&gt;F&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&lt;/div&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Internet Explorer 10 and earlier versions do not support the flex-wrap property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Safari 6.1 (and newer) supports an alternative, the -webkit-flex-wrap property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;/body&gt;</div><div>&lt;/html&gt;</div>"	Flexible Box Layout	
justify-content	Specifies the alignment between the items inside a flexible container when the items do not use all available space	Выравнивание элементов по горизонтали.<div>Свойство выравнивает flex-элементы по ширине flex-контейнера, распределяя оставшееся свободное пространство, незанятое flex-элементами. Для выравнивания элементов по вертикали используется свойство align-content. Свойство не наследуется.</div>	3	justify-content: flex-start|flex-end|center|space-between|space-around|initial|inherit;		"<div>&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</div><div>&lt;html&gt;</div><div>&lt;head&gt;</div><div>&lt;style&gt;&nbsp;</div><div>#main {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; width: 400px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; height: 150px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; border: 1px solid #c3c3c3;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: -webkit-flex; /* Safari */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; -webkit-justify-content: space-around; /* Safari 6.1+ */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: flex;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; justify-content: space-around;</div><div>}</div><div><br /></div><div>#main div {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; width: 70px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; height: 70px;</div><div>}</div><div>&lt;/style&gt;</div><div>&lt;/head&gt;</div><div>&lt;body&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;div id=""main""&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:coral;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightblue;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:khaki;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:pink;""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&lt;/div&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Internet Explorer 10 and earlier versions do not support the justify-content property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Safari 6.1 (and newer) supports an alternative, the -webkit-justify-content property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;/body&gt;</div><div>&lt;/html&gt;</div>"	Flexible Box Layout	
order	Sets the order of the flexible item, relative to the rest	Порядок отображения элементов.<div>Свойство определяет порядок, в котором flex-элементы отображаются внутри flex-контейнера. По умолчанию для всех flex-элементов задан порядок order: 0; и они следуют друг за другом по мере добавления во flex-контейнер. Самый первый flex-элемент по умолчанию расположен слева. Чтобы поставить любой flex-элемент в начало строки, ему нужно назначить order: -1;, в конец строки — order: 1;. Свойство не наследуется.</div>	3	order: number|initial|inherit;		"<div>&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</div><div>&lt;html&gt;</div><div>&lt;head&gt;</div><div>&lt;style&gt;&nbsp;</div><div>#main {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; width: 400px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; height: 150px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; border: 1px solid #c3c3c3;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: -webkit-flex; /* Safari */</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; display: flex;</div><div>}</div><div><br /></div><div>#main div {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; width: 70px;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; height: 70px;</div><div>}</div><div><br /></div><div>/* Safari 6.1+ */</div><div>div#myRedDIV &nbsp; {-webkit-order: 2;}</div><div>div#myBlueDIV &nbsp;{-webkit-order: 4;}</div><div>div#myGreenDIV {-webkit-order: 3;}</div><div>div#myPinkDIV &nbsp;{-webkit-order: 1;}</div><div><br /></div><div>/* Standard syntax */</div><div>div#myRedDIV &nbsp; {order: 2;}</div><div>div#myBlueDIV &nbsp;{order: 4;}</div><div>div#myGreenDIV {order: 3;}</div><div>div#myPinkDIV &nbsp;{order: 1;}</div><div>&lt;/style&gt;</div><div>&lt;/head&gt;</div><div>&lt;body&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;div id=""main""&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:coral;"" id=""myRedDIV""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightblue;"" id=""myBlueDIV""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:lightgreen;"" id=""myGreenDIV""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&nbsp; &lt;div style=""background-color:pink;"" id=""myPinkDIV""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</div><div>&lt;/div&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Internet Explorer 10 and earlier versions do not support the order property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Safari 6.1 (and newer) supports an alternative, the -webkit-order property.&lt;/p&gt;</div><div><br /></div><div>&lt;/body&gt;</div><div>&lt;/html&gt;</div>"	Flexible Box Layout	
hanging-punctuation	Specifies whether a punctuation character may be placed outside the line box		3	hanging-punctuation: none|first|last|allow-end|force-end|initial|inherit;			Text Properties	
hyphens	Sets how to split words to improve the layout of paragraphs		3				Text Properties	
letter-spacing	Increases or decreases the space between characters in a text		1	letter-spacing: normal|length|initial|inherit;		&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>h1 {<br>    letter-spacing: 2px;<br>}<br><br>h2 {<br>    letter-spacing: -3px;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;h1&gt;This is heading 1&lt;/h1&gt;<br>&lt;h2&gt;This is heading 2&lt;/h2&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;	Text Properties	
line-break	Specifies how/if to break lines		3				Text Properties	
line-height	Sets the line height		1	line-height: normal|number|length|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt;<br>p.small {<br>    line-height: 70%;<br>}<br><br>p.big {<br>    line-height: 200%;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;<br>This is a paragraph with a standard line-height.&lt;br&gt;<br>This is a paragraph with a standard line-height.&lt;br&gt;<br>The default line height in most browsers is about 110% to 120%.&lt;br&gt;<br>&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;p class=""small""&gt;<br>This is a paragraph with a smaller line-height.&lt;br&gt;<br>This is a paragraph with a smaller line-height.&lt;br&gt;<br>This is a paragraph with a smaller line-height.&lt;br&gt;<br>This is a paragraph with a smaller line-height.&lt;br&gt;<br>&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;p class=""big""&gt;<br>This is a paragraph with a bigger line-height.&lt;br&gt;<br>This is a paragraph with a bigger line-height.&lt;br&gt;<br>This is a paragraph with a bigger line-height.&lt;br&gt;<br>This is a paragraph with a bigger line-height.&lt;br&gt;<br>&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Text Properties	
overflow-wrap	Specifies whether or not the browser may break lines within words in order to prevent overflow (when a string is too long to fit its containing box)		3				Text Properties	
tab-size	Specifies the length of the tab-character		3	tab-size: number|length|initial|inherit;		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt; <br>    -moz-tab-size: 4; /* Code for Firefox */<br>    -o-tab-size: 4; /* Code for Opera 10.6-12.1 */<br>    tab-size: 4;<br>}<br><br>    -moz-tab-size: 16; /* Code for Firefox */<br>    -o-tab-size: 16; /* Code for Opera 10.6-12.1 */<br>    tab-size: 16;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;pre id=""t1""&gt;<br>I use tab-size 4<br>&lt;/pre&gt;<br><br>&lt;pre id=""t2""&gt;<br>I use tab-size 16<br>&lt;/pre&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; The tab-size property is currently supported in Chrome, Safari 6.1+ and Opera 15+.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Firefox supports an alternative, the -moz-tab-size property.&lt;/p&gt;<br>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Opera 10.6 to 12.1 supports an alternative, the -o-tab-size property.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Text Properties

'Whenever you feel like criticizing anyone,' he told me, 'just remember that all the people in this world haven't had the advantages that you've had.'&lt;/div&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Tip:&lt;/b&gt; Resize the browser window to see how the value ""justify"" works.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; The text-justify property only works in IE.&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Text Properties

@font-face	"A rule that allows websites to download and use fonts other than the ""web-safe"" fonts"		3	@font-face {font-properties}		"&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;<br>&lt;html&gt;<br>&lt;head&gt;<br>&lt;style&gt; <br>@font-face {<br>    font-family: myFirstFont;<br>    src: url(sansation_light.woff);<br>}<br><br>div {<br>    font-family: myFirstFont;<br>}<br>&lt;/style&gt;<br>&lt;/head&gt;<br>&lt;body&gt;<br><br>&lt;div&gt;With CSS3, websites can finally use fonts other than the pre selected ""web-safe"" fonts.&lt;/div&gt;<br><br>&lt;p&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; Internet Explorer 8 and earlier, do not support the @font-face rule with the WOFF format (only support for EOT format).&lt;/p&gt;<br><br>&lt;/body&gt;<br>&lt;/html&gt;"	Font Properties
