"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 30px;"">chr</h2>"	"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 30px;""><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);"">The&nbsp;<code style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 17.55px; padding: 2px 4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;"">chr()</code>&nbsp;function returns a character when you pass it an ASCII value.</small></h2><p style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 19px;""><span class=""label label-info"" style=""box-sizing: border-box; display: inline; padding: 0.2em 0.6em 0.3em; font-size: 14.25px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 1; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-align: center; white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; border-radius: 0.25em; background-color: rgb(91, 192, 222);""><strong style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: bold;"">Usage:</strong></span>&nbsp;Returns a string consisting of the single ASCII character&nbsp;<strong style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: bold;"">ascii</strong>.</p>"	
"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 30px;"">trim</h2>"	"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 30px;""><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);"">The&nbsp;<code style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 17.55px; padding: 2px 4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;"">trim()</code>&nbsp;function cleans a string of all whitespace or other specified characters.</small></h2><div><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><br></small></div><div><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><table class=""table table-striped table-hover"" style=""box-sizing: border-box; border-spacing: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 925px; margin-bottom: 20px; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 19px;""><tbody style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249);""><th style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Argument</th><th style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Argument Meaning</th></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">string</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Mandatory. Specifies the string to check</td></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249);""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">charlist</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Not Mandatory. Specifies which characters to remove from the string. If left out, all of the following characters are removed:<p style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px;""></p><ul style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 10px;""><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">“” – NULL</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">“t” – tab</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">“n” – new line</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">“x0B” – vertical tab</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">“r” – carriage return</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">” ” – ordinary white space</li></ul></td></tr></tbody></table></small></div><div><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><br></small></div>"	
"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 30px;"">str_repeat</h2>"	"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 30px;""><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);"">The&nbsp;<code style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 17.55px; padding: 2px 4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;"">str_repeat()</code>&nbsp;function repeats a string a specified number of times..</small></h2><div><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><br></small></div><div><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><table class=""table table-striped table-hover"" style=""box-sizing: border-box; border-spacing: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 925px; margin-bottom: 20px; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 19px;""><tbody style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Argument Meaning</th></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">string</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Mandatory. Specifies the string to repeat</td></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249);""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">repeat</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Mandatory. Specifies the number of times the string will be repeated. Must be greater or equal to 0</td></tr></tbody></table></small></div>"	
"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 30px;"">&nbsp;strtoupper</h2>"	"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 30px;""><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);"">The&nbsp;<code style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 17.55px; padding: 2px 4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;"">strtoupper()</code>&nbsp;function returns a string with all of it’s characters converted to uppercase.</small></h2>"	
"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 30px;"">str_pad</h2>"	"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 30px;""><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);"">The&nbsp;<code style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 17.55px; padding: 2px 4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;"">str_pad()</code>&nbsp;function pads a string to a new length.</small></h2><div><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><br></small></div><div><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><table class=""table table-striped table-hover"" style=""box-sizing: border-box; border-spacing: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 925px; margin-bottom: 20px; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 19px;""><tbody style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245);""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">string</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Mandatory. Specifies the string to pad</td></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249);""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">length</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Mandatory. Specifies the new string length. If this value is less than the original length of the string, nothing will be done</td></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">pad_string</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Not Mandatory. Specifies the string to use for padding. Default is whitespace</td></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249);""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">pad_type</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Not Mandatory. Specifies what side to pad the string.<p style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px;""></p><p style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px;"">Possible values:</p><ul style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 10px;""><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">STR_PAD_BOTH – Pad to both sides of the string. If not an even number, the right side gets the extra padding</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">STR_PAD_LEFT – Pad to the left side of the string</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">STR_PAD_RIGHT – Pad to the right side of the string. This is default</li></ul></td></tr></tbody></table></small></div>"

"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 30px;"">rtrim</h2>"	"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; Specifies the string to check</td></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249);""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">charlist</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Not Mandatory. Specifies which characters to remove from the string. If left out, all of the following characters are removed:<p style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px;""></p><ul style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 10px;""><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">“” – NULL</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">“t” – tab</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">“n” – new line</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">“x0B” – vertical tab</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">“r” – carriage return</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">” ” – ordinary white space</li></ul></td></tr></tbody></table></small></div>"	
"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 30px;"">md5</h2>"	"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; Specifies where to begin the search</td></tr></tbody></table></small></div>"	
join	"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 30px;""><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);"">The&nbsp;<code style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 17.55px; padding: 2px 4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;"">join()</code>&nbsp;function returns a string from the elements of an array.</small></h2><div><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><br></small></div><div><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><h3 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 24px;"">join function signature&nbsp;<small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 15.6px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><strong style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: bold;"">join</strong>(<em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">separator, array</em>)</small></h3><p style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 19px;""></p><table class=""table table-striped table-hover"" style=""box-sizing: border-box; border-spacing: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 925px; margin-bottom: 20px; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 19px;""><tbody style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249);""><th style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Argument</th><th style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Argument Meaning</th></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">separator</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Not Mandatory. Specifies what to put between the array elements. Default is “” (an empty string)</td></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249);""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">array</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Mandatory. The array to join to a string</td></tr></tbody></table></small></div>"	
bin2hex	"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 30px;""><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);"">The&nbsp;<code style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 17.55px; padding: 2px 4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;"">bin2hex()</code>&nbsp;function returns a part of a string.</small></h2><div><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><br></small></div><div><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><h3 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 24px;"">bin2hex function signature&nbsp;<small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 15.6px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><strong style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: bold;"">bin2hex</strong>(<em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">string</em>)</small></h3><p style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 19px;""></p><table class=""table table-striped table-hover"" style=""box-sizing: border-box; border-spacing: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 925px; margin-bottom: 20px; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 19px;""><tbody style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245);""><th style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Argument</th><th style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Argument Meaning</th></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">string</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Mandatory. Specifies the string to be converted to hex</td></tr></tbody></table></small></div>"	
ltrim	"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 30px;""><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);"">The&nbsp;<code style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 17.55px; padding: 2px 4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;"">ltrim()</code>&nbsp;function removes whitespace or other predefined characters from the left side of a string.<br><br></small></h2><div><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><h3 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 24px;"">ltrim function signature&nbsp;<small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 15.6px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><strong style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: bold;"">ltrim</strong>(<em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">string, charlist</em>)</small></h3><p style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 19px;""></p><table class=""table table-striped table-hover"" style=""box-sizing: border-box; border-spacing: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 925px; margin-bottom: 20px; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 19px;""><tbody style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245);""><th style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Argument</th><th style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Argument Meaning</th></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">string</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Mandatory. Specifies the string to check</td></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249);""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">charlist</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Not Mandatory. Specifies which characters to remove from the string. If left out, all of the following characters are removed:<p style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px;""></p><ul style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 10px;""><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">“” – NULL</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">“t” – tab</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">“n” – new line</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">“x0B” – vertical tab</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">“r” – carriage return</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">” ” – ordinary white space</li></ul></td></tr></tbody></table></small></div>"	
substr_replace	"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 30px;""><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);"">The&nbsp;<code style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 17.55px; padding: 2px 4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;"">substr_replace()</code>&nbsp;function replaces a part of a string with another string.</small></h2><div><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><br></small></div><div><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><h3 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 24px;"">substr_replace function signature&nbsp;<small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 15.6px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><strong style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: bold;"">substr_replace</strong>(<em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">string, replacement, start, length</em>)</small></h3><p style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 19px;""></p><table class=""table table-striped table-hover"" style=""box-sizing: border-box; border-spacing: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 925px; margin-bottom: 20px; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 19px;""><tbody style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249);""><th style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Argument</th><th style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Argument Meaning</th></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">string</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Mandatory. Specifies the string to check</td></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249);""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">replacement</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Mandatory. Specifies the string to insert</td></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">start</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Mandatory. Specifies where to start replacing in the string<p style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px;""></p><ul style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 10px;""><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">A positive number – Start replacing at the specified position in the string</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">Negative number – Start replacing at the specified position from the end of the string</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">0 – Start replacing at the first character in the string</li></ul></td></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249);""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">length</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Not Mandatory. Specifies how many characters should be replaced. Default is the same length as the string.<p style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px;""></p><ul style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 10px;""><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">A positive number – The length of string to be replaced</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">A negative number – How many characters should be left at end of string after replacing</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">0 – Insert instead of replace</li></ul></td></tr></tbody></table></small></div>"	
str_split	"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 30px;""><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);"">The&nbsp;<code style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 17.55px; padding: 2px 4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;"">str_split()</code>&nbsp;function splits a string into an array.</small></h2><h3 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 24px;""><br></h3><h3 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">string</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Mandatory. Specifies the string to split</td></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249);""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">length</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Not Mandatory. Specifies the length of each array element. Default is 1</td></tr></tbody></table>"	
sha1	"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 30px;""><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);"">The&nbsp;<code style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 17.55px; padding: 2px 4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;"">sha1()</code>&nbsp;function returns a part of a string.</small></h2><div><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><br></small></div><div><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><h3 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 24px;"">sha1 function signature&nbsp;<small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 15.6px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><strong style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: bold;"">sha1</strong>(<em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">string, raw</em>)</small></h3><p style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 19px;""></p><table class=""table table-striped table-hover"" style=""box-sizing: border-box; border-spacing: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 925px; margin-bottom: 20px; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 19px;""><tbody style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249);""><th style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Argument</th><th style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Argument Meaning</th></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">string</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Mandatory. The string to be calculated</td></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249);""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">raw</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Not Mandatory. Specify hex or binary output format:<p style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px;""></p><ul style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 10px;""><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">TRUE – Raw 20 character binary format</li><li style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">FALSE – Default. 40 character hex number</li></ul></td></tr></tbody></table></small></div>"	
ucfirst	"<h3 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 24px;"">ucfirst function signature&nbsp;<small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 15.6px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><strong style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: bold;"">ucfirst</strong>(<em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">string</em>)</small></h3><p style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 19px;""></p><table class=""table table-striped table-hover"" style=""box-sizing: border-box; border-spacing: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 925px; margin-bottom: 20px; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 19px;""><tbody style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249);""><th style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Argument</th><th style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Argument Meaning</th></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">string</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Mandatory. Specifies the string to apply an uppercase first letter to.</td></tr></tbody></table><h4 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 18px;"">Code Example</h4><p style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 19px;""></p><div id=""crayon-5a0ea9598f8dc522974027"" class=""crayon-syntax crayon-theme-github crayon-font-verdana crayon-os-pc print-yes notranslate"" data-settings="" minimize scroll-always"" style=""box-sizing: border-box; chunk_split	"<h2 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 30px;""><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);"">The&nbsp;<code style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 17.55px; padding: 2px 4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;"">chunk_split()</code>&nbsp;function splits a string into a series of smaller parts.</small></h2><div><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><br></small></div><div><small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 19.5px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><h3 style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 24px;"">chunk_split function signature&nbsp;<small style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 15.6px; line-height: 1; color: rgb(119, 119, 119);""><strong style=""box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: bold;"">chunk_split</strong>(<em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">string, length, end</em>)</small></h3><p style=""box-sizing: border-box; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 0px; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 19px;""></p><table class=""table table-striped table-hover"" style=""box-sizing: border-box; border-spacing: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 925px; margin-bottom: 20px; color: rgb(84, 84, 84); font-family: &quot;Open Sans&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 19px;""><tbody style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249);""><th style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Argument</th><th style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Argument Meaning</th></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">string</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Mandatory. Specifies the string to split</td></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249);""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">length</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Not Mandatory. A number that defines the length of the chunks. Default is 76</td></tr><tr style=""box-sizing: border-box;""><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);""><em style=""box-sizing: border-box;"">end</em></td><td style=""box-sizing: border-box; padding: 8px; line-height: 1.42857; border-top-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);"">Not Mandatory. A string that defines what to place at the end of each chunk. Default is rn<br><br></td></tr></tbody></table><div id=""crayon-5a0ea9598f8e1492522391"" class=""crayon-syntax crayon-theme-github crayon-font-verdana crayon-os-pc print-yes notranslate"" data-settings="" minimize scroll-always"" style=""box-sizing: border-box; What does the GIL do?	"a lock that must be acquired each time CPython needs to execute byte-code<div><br /></div><div><div>2 &nbsp; 0 LOAD_CONST &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;0 ('A')</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; 3 LOAD_CONST &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;3 (())</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; 6 LOAD_CONST &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;1 (&lt;code object A at 0x42424242, file ""&lt;string&gt;"", line 2&gt;)</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; 9 MAKE_FUNCTION &nbsp; &nbsp; 0</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp;12 CALL_FUNCTION &nbsp; &nbsp; 0</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp;15 BUILD_CLASS</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp;16 STORE_NAME &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;0 (A)</div></div>"	
What is&nbsp;the best way to run long-running concurrent tasks	from concurrent.futures import ProcessPoolExecutor	
Write program that uses futures to compute 8 times<div><br /></div><div>import random</div><div><br /></div><div><div>def compute():</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; return sum(random.randint(1, 100) for _ in range(1_000_000))</div></div>	<div>from concurrent import futures</div><div><br /></div><div>with futures.ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=9) as executor:</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; future = [executor.submit(compute) for _ in range(8)]</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</div><div>results = [f.result() for f in future]</div><div>print(results)</div>	
<div><div>x = 3 + 2j</div><div><br /></div><div>y = 3 - 2j</div><div><br /></div><div>z = x + y</div><div><br /></div><div>print(z)</div></div><div><br /></div>What is the result?	<div>(6+0j)</div>

"<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">crypt</span>"	"<div class=""refnamediv"" style=""position: relative; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><p class=""refpurpose"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;""><span class=""dc-title"">Необратимое хэширование строки</span></p></div><div class=""refsect1 description"" id=""refsect1-function.crypt-description"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Описание<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.crypt.php#refsect1-function.crypt-description"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><div class=""methodsynopsis dc-description"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-size: 1rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px 0px 1.5rem; padding: 0.75rem; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; border-radius: 0px 0px 2px 2px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-color: rgb(217, 217, 217);""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<span class=""methodname""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">crypt</span></span>&nbsp;(&nbsp;<span class=""methodparam""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$str</code></span>&nbsp;[,&nbsp;<span class=""methodparam""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$salt</code></span>&nbsp;] )</div><p class=""para rdfs-comment"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;""><span class=""function""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">crypt()</span></span>&nbsp;возвращает хэшированную строку, полученную с помощью стандартного алгоритма UNIX, основанного на&nbsp;<abbr class=""abbrev"" style=""border-bottom: 1px dotted rgb(136, 146, 191); cursor: help; border-top-color: rgb(136, 146, 191); border-right-color: rgb(136, 146, 191); border-left-color: rgb(136, 146, 191);"">DES</abbr>, или другого алгоритма, имеющегося в системе.</p><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Параметр&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer;"">salt</code>&nbsp;является необязательным. Однако без&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer;"">salt</code>&nbsp;функция&nbsp;<span class=""function""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">crypt()</span></span>&nbsp;создает слабый пароль. PHP 5.6 и новее вызывают ошибку E_NOTICE, если не использовать соль. Убедитесь, что используете достаточно сложную соль для лучшей безопасности.</p><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Функция&nbsp;<span class=""function""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.password-hash.php"" class=""function"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">password_hash()</a></span>&nbsp;использует сложный хэш, генерирует сложную соль и применяет правильно количество раундов хэширования автоматически.&nbsp;<span class=""function""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.password-hash.php"" class=""function"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">password_hash()</a></span>&nbsp;является простой оберткой над&nbsp;<span class=""function""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">crypt()</span></span>&nbsp;и совместима с существующими хэшами паролей. Поэтому приветствуется использование&nbsp;<span class=""function""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.password-hash.php"" class=""function"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">password_hash()</a></span>.</p><div class=""refsect1 parameters"" id=""refsect1-function.crypt-parameters"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem;""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Список параметров<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.crypt.php#refsect1-function.crypt-parameters"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><dl style=""margin-bottom: 0px;""><dt style=""height: 1.5rem;""><code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer;"">str</code></dt><dd style=""margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; padding: 0px 1.5rem;""><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Хэшируемая строка.</p><div class=""caution"" style=""padding: 0.75rem; margin: 1.5rem 0px; overflow: hidden; background: rgb(252, 252, 233); border-color: rgb(226, 226, 209); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; border-radius: 0px 0px 2px 2px;""><span class=""caution"" style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-weight: bolder; float: left; margin-right: 0.5rem; font-size: 1.125rem;"">Предостережение</span><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px;"">При использовании алгоритма&nbsp;<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">CRYPT_BLOWFISH</code></span>, параметр&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer;"">str</code>&nbsp;обрезается до 72 символов.</p></div></dd><dt style=""height: 1.5rem;""><code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer;"">salt</code></dt><dd style=""margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; padding: 0px 1.5rem;""><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Необязательный параметр с солью, на которой будет основано хэширование. Если не указан, поведение определяется по наличию реализованных алгоритмов в системе и может привести к неожиданным результатам.</p></dd></dl></div><div class=""refsect1 returnvalues"" id=""refsect1-function.crypt-returnvalues"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem;""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Возвращаемые значения<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.crypt.php#refsect1-function.crypt-returnvalues"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Возвращает хэшированную строку или строку короче 13 символов, гарантированно отличающуюся от соли в случае ошибки.</p><div class=""warning"" style=""padding: 0.75rem; margin: 1.5rem 0px; overflow: hidden; background: rgb(244, 223, 223); border-color: rgb(234, 191, 191); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; border-radius: 0px 0px 2px 2px;""><span class=""warning"" style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-weight: bolder; float: left; margin-right: 0.5rem; font-size: 1.125rem;"">Внимание</span><p class=""simpara"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px;"">При валидации паролей должны использоваться функции сравнения строк, устойчивые к атаке по времени, для сравнения вывода функции&nbsp;<span class=""function""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">crypt()</span></span>&nbsp;с известным хэшом. В PHP 5.6 и новее для этих целей есть функция&nbsp;<span class=""function""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.hash-equals.php"" class=""function"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">hash_equals()</a></span>.</p></div></div></div>"	
"<span style=""color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);"">Необратимое хэширование строки</span>"	"<span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">string</span><span style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">&nbsp;</span><span class=""methodname"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">crypt</span></span><span style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">&nbsp;(&nbsp;</span><span class=""methodparam"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$str</code></span><span style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">&nbsp;[,&nbsp;</span><span class=""methodparam"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$salt</code></span><span style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">&nbsp;] )</span>"	
"<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">hash_equals</span>"	"<div class=""refnamediv"" style=""position: relative; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><p class=""refpurpose"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;""><span class=""dc-title"">Сравнение строк нечуствительное к атакам по времени</span></p></div><div class=""refsect1 description"" id=""refsect1-function.hash-equals-description"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Описание<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.hash-equals.php#refsect1-function.hash-equals-description"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><div class=""methodsynopsis dc-description"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-size: 1rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px 0px 1.5rem; padding: 0.75rem; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; border-radius: 0px 0px 2px 2px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-color: rgb(217, 217, 217);""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">bool</span>&nbsp;<span class=""methodname""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">hash_equals</span></span>&nbsp;(&nbsp;<span class=""methodparam""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$known_string</code></span>&nbsp;,&nbsp;<span class=""methodparam""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$user_string</code></span>&nbsp;)</div><p class=""para rdfs-comment"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Сравнивает две строки на идентичность, используя одинаковое время, вне зависимости, равны они или нет.</p><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Эта функция может использоваться для предотвращения атак по времени; к примеру при проверке хешей паролей с помощью&nbsp;<span class=""function""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.crypt.php"" class=""function"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">crypt()</a></span>.</p></div><div class=""refsect1 parameters"" id=""refsect1-function.hash-equals-parameters"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Список параметров<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.hash-equals.php#refsect1-function.hash-equals-parameters"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><dl style=""margin-bottom: 0px;""><dt style=""height: 1.5rem;""><code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer;"">known_string</code></dt><dd style=""margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; padding: 0px 1.5rem;""><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Строка известной длины, с которой будет производиться сравнение.</p></dd><dt style=""height: 1.5rem;""><code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer;"">user_string</code></dt><dd style=""margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; padding: 0px 1.5rem;""><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Проверяемая строка.</p></dd></dl></div><div class=""refsect1 returnvalues"" id=""refsect1-function.hash-equals-returnvalues"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Возвращаемые значения<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.hash-equals.php#refsect1-function.hash-equals-returnvalues"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Возвращает&nbsp;<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">TRUE</code></span>&nbsp;если строки идентичны и&nbsp;<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">FALSE</code></span>&nbsp;если нет.</p><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;""><br></p><div class=""refsect1 errors"" id=""refsect1-function.hash-equals-errors"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem;""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Ошибки<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.hash-equals.php#refsect1-function.hash-equals-errors"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Выдает ошибку уровня&nbsp;<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">E_WARNING</code></span>, если один из параметров не является строкой.</p></div><div class=""refsect1 examples"" id=""refsect1-function.hash-equals-examples"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem;""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Примеры<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.hash-equals.php#refsect1-function.hash-equals-examples"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><div class=""example"" id=""example-914"" style=""margin: 1.5rem 0px;""><p style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">Пример #1 Пример использования&nbsp;<span class=""function""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">hash_equals()</span></span></span></p><div class=""example-contents"" style=""margin-bottom: 1.5rem;""><div class=""phpcode"" style=""background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; border-radius: 0px 0px 2px 2px; padding: 0.75rem;""><code style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family:
