187);"">&lt;?php<br>$expected&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">=&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">crypt</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">(</span><span style=""color: rgb(221, 0, 0);"">'12345'</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">,&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(221, 0, 0);"">'$2a$07$usesomesillystringforsalt$'</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">);<br></span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">$correct&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">=&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">crypt</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">(</span><span style=""color: rgb(221, 0, 0);"">'12345'</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">,&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(221, 0, 0);"">'$2a$07$usesomesillystringforsalt$'</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">);<br></span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">$incorrect&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">=&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">crypt</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">(</span><span style=""color: rgb(221, 0, 0);"">'apple'</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">,&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(221, 0, 0);"">'$2a$07$usesomesillystringforsalt$'</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">);<br><br></span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">var_dump</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">(</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">hash_equals</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">(</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">$expected</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">,&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">$correct</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">));<br></span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">var_dump</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">(</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">hash_equals</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">(</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">$expected</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">,&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">$incorrect</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">));<br></span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">?&gt;</span></span></code></div></div><div class=""example-contents"" style=""margin-bottom: 1.5rem;""><p style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Результат выполнения данного примера:</p></div><div class=""example-contents screen"" style=""margin-bottom: 1.5rem; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; border-radius: 0px 0px 2px 2px; padding: 0.75rem;""><div class=""cdata""><pre style=""white-space: pre-wrap; margin-bottom: 0px;"">bool(true) bool(false)</pre></div></div></div></div></div>"	
"<p class=""para rdfs-comment"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);"">Сравнивает две строки на идентичность, используя одинаковое время, вне зависимости, равны они или нет.</p><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);"">Эта функция может использоваться для предотвращения атак по времени; к примеру при проверке хешей паролей с помощью&nbsp;<span class=""function""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.crypt.php"" class=""function"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">crypt()</a></span>.</p>"	"<span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">bool</span><span style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">&nbsp;</span><span class=""methodname"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">hash_equals</span></span><span style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">&nbsp;(&nbsp;</span><span class=""methodparam"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$known_string</code></span><span style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">&nbsp;,&nbsp;</span><span class=""methodparam"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$user_string</code></span><span style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">&nbsp;)</span>"	
"<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">password_verify</span>"	"<div class=""refnamediv"" style=""position: relative; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><p class=""refpurpose"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">&nbsp;<span class=""dc-title"">Проверяет, соответствует ли пароль хешу</span></p></div><div class=""refsect1 description"" id=""refsect1-function.password-verify-description"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Описание<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.password-verify.php#refsect1-function.password-verify-description"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><div class=""methodsynopsis dc-description"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-size: 1rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px 0px 1.5rem; padding: 0.75rem; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; border-radius: 0px 0px 2px 2px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-color: rgb(217, 217, 217);""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">boolean</span>&nbsp;<span class=""methodname""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">password_verify</span></span>&nbsp;(&nbsp;<span class=""methodparam""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$password</code></span>&nbsp;,&nbsp;<span class=""methodparam""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$hash</code></span>&nbsp;)</div><p class=""para rdfs-comment"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Проверяет, соответствует ли пароль хешу.</p><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Обратите внимание, что&nbsp;<span class=""function""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.password-hash.php"" class=""function"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">password_hash()</a></span>&nbsp;возвращает алгоритм, стоимость и соль как части хеша. Таким образом, вся необходимая для проверки информация включена в него. Это позволяет производить проверку без необходимости хранить все эти данные раздельно.</p><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Эта функция безопасна для атак по времени.</p></div><div class=""refsect1 parameters"" id=""refsect1-function.password-verify-parameters"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Список параметров<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.password-verify.php#refsect1-function.password-verify-parameters"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><dl style=""margin-bottom: 0px;""><dt style=""height: 1.5rem;""><code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer;"">password</code></dt><dd style=""margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; padding: 0px 1.5rem;""><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Пользовательский пароль.</p></dd><dt style=""height: 1.5rem;""><code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer;"">hash</code></dt><dd style=""margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; padding: 0px 1.5rem;""><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Хеш, созданный функцией&nbsp;<span class=""function""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.password-hash.php"" class=""function"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">password_hash()</a></span>.</p></dd></dl></div><div class=""refsect1 returnvalues"" id=""refsect1-function.password-verify-returnvalues"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Возвращаемые значения<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.password-verify.php#refsect1-function.password-verify-returnvalues"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Возвращает&nbsp;<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">TRUE</code></span>&nbsp;или&nbsp;<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">FALSE</code></span>, в зависимости от результатов проверки.</p></div><div class=""refsect1 examples"" id=""refsect1-function.password-verify-examples"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Примеры<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.password-verify.php#refsect1-function.password-verify-examples"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><div class=""example"" id=""openssl_spki_export_challenge.example.basic"" style=""margin: 1.5rem 0px;""><p style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">Пример #1 Пример использования&nbsp;<span class=""function""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">password_verify()</span></span></span></p><div class=""example-contents"" style=""margin-bottom: 1.5rem;""><div class=""phpcode"" style=""background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; border-radius: 0px 0px 2px 2px; padding: 0.75rem;""><code style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; display: block;""><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 0);""><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">&lt;?php<br></span><span style=""color: rgb(255, 128, 0);"">//&nbsp;Смотрите&nbsp;пример&nbsp;использования&nbsp;password_hash(),&nbsp;для&nbsp;понимания&nbsp;откуда&nbsp;это&nbsp;взялось.<br></span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">$hash&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">=&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(221, 0, 0);"">'$2y$07$BCryptRequires22Chrcte/VlQH0piJtjXl.0t1XkA8pw9dMXTpOq'</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">;<br><br>if&nbsp;(</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">password_verify</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">(</span><span style=""color: rgb(221, 0, 0);"">'rasmuslerdorf'</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">,&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">$hash</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">))&nbsp;{<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;echo&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(221, 0, 0);"">'Пароль&nbsp;правильный!'</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">;<br>}&nbsp;else&nbsp;{<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;echo&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(221, 0, 0);"">'Пароль&nbsp;неправильный.'</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">;<br>}<br></span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">?&gt;</span></span></code></div></div><div class=""example-contents"" style=""margin-bottom: 1.5rem;""><p style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Результат выполнения данного примера:</p></div><div class=""example-contents screen"" style=""margin-bottom: 1.5rem; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; border-radius: 0px 0px 2px 2px; padding: 0.75rem;""><div class=""cdata""><pre style=""white-space: pre-wrap; margin-bottom: 0px;"">Пароль правильный!</pre></div></div></div></div>"	
"<span style=""color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);"">Проверяет, соответствует ли пароль хешу</span>"	"<span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">boolean</span><span style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">&nbsp;</span><span class=""methodname"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">password_verify</span></span><span style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">&nbsp;(&nbsp;</span><span class=""methodparam"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$password</code></span><span style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">&nbsp;,&nbsp;</span><span class=""methodparam"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$hash</code></span><span style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">&nbsp;)</span>"	
"<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">password_hash</span>"	"<div class=""refnamediv"" style=""position: relative; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><p class=""refpurpose"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;""><span class=""dc-title"">Создает хеш пароля</span></p></div><div class=""refsect1 description"" id=""refsect1-function.password-hash-description"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Описание<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.password-hash.php#refsect1-function.password-hash-description"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><div class=""methodsynopsis dc-description"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-size: 1rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px 0px 1.5rem; padding: 0.75rem; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; border-radius: 0px 0px 2px 2px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-color: rgb(217, 217, 217);""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<span class=""methodname""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">password_hash</span></span>&nbsp;(&nbsp;<span class=""methodparam""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$password</code></span>&nbsp;,&nbsp;<span class=""methodparam""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">integer</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$algo</code></span>&nbsp;[,&nbsp;<span class=""methodparam""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">array</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$options</code></span>&nbsp;] )</div><p class=""para rdfs-comment"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;""><span class=""function""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">password_hash()</span></span>&nbsp;создает хеш пароля используя сильный, необратимый алгоритм хеширования. Функция&nbsp;<span class=""function""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">password_hash()</span></span>&nbsp;совместима с функцией&nbsp;<span class=""function""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.crypt.php"" class=""function"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">crypt()</a></span>. Следовательно, хеши паролей, созданные&nbsp;<span class=""function""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.crypt.php"" class=""function"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">crypt()</a></span>&nbsp;можно использовать с&nbsp;<span class=""function""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">password_hash()</span></span>.</p><p class=""simpara"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">В данный момент поддерживаются следующие алгоритмы:</p><ul class=""itemizedlist"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 1.5rem; padding: 0px; list-style-type: circle;""><li class=""listitem""><span class=""simpara""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">PASSWORD_DEFAULT</code></span>&nbsp;- используется алгоритм bcrypt (по умолчанию с PHP 5.5.0). Обратите внимание, что используемый алгоритм может со временем меняться на более сильный, когда таковой добавляется в PHP. Соответственно и длина результата может со временем меняться. В связи с этим рекомендуется выбирать длину поля для хранения в базе данных более 60 символов (255 символов могло быть хорошим вариантом).</span></li><li class=""listitem""><span class=""simpara""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">PASSWORD_BCRYPT</code></span>&nbsp;- использует алгоритм&nbsp;<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">CRYPT_BLOWFISH</code></span>. Генерирует стандартный хеш, совместимый с генерированным функцией&nbsp;<span class=""function""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.crypt.php"" class=""function"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">crypt()</a></span>&nbsp;с использованием идентификатора ""$2y$"". В результате будет сгенерирована строка длиной 60 символов, или&nbsp;<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">FALSE</code></span>&nbsp;в случае возникновения ошибки.</span></li><li class=""listitem""><span class=""simpara""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">PASSWORD_ARGON2I</code></span>&nbsp;- Использовать алгоритм хеширования Argon2.</span></li></ul><p class=""simpara"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Поддерживаемые опции для&nbsp;<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">PASSWORD_BCRYPT</code></span>:</p><ul class=""itemizedlist"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 1.5rem; padding: 0px; list-style-type: circle;""><li class=""listitem""><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;""><em style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">salt</em>&nbsp;(<span class=""type""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/language.types.string.php"" class=""type string"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">string</a></span>) - для самостоятельного задания соли для хеширования. Обратите внимание, что это приведет к переопределению и предотвращению автоматического создания соли.</p><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Если не задано, то&nbsp;<span class=""function""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">password_hash()</span></span>&nbsp;будет генерировать случайную соль для каждого хешируемого пароля. Это предпочтительный режим работы.</p><div class=""warning"" style=""padding: 0.75rem; margin: 1.5rem 0px; overflow: hidden; background: rgb(244, 223, 223); border-color: rgb(234, 191, 191); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; border-radius: 0px 0px 2px 2px;""><span class=""warning"" style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; float: left; margin-right: 0.5rem; font-size: 1.125rem;"">Внимание</span><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px;"">Эта опция была объявлена устаревшей начиная с PHP 7.0.0. Рекомендуется использовать автоматически генерируемую соль.</p></div></li><li class=""listitem""><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;""><em style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">cost</em>&nbsp;(<span class=""type""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/language.types.integer.php"" class=""type integer"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">integer</a></span>) - задает необходимую алгоритмическую сложность. Пример использования этого значения можно посмотреть на странице посвященной функции&nbsp;<span class=""function""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.crypt.php"" class=""function"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">crypt()</a></span>.</p><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Если не задано, то будет использовано значение по умолчанию&nbsp;<em style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">10</em>. Это хорошая базовая стоимость, но вы можете ее увеличить в зависимости от возможностей своего оборудования.</p></li></ul><p class=""simpara"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Поддерживаемые опции для&nbsp;<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">PASSWORD_ARGON2I</code></span>:</p><ul class=""itemizedlist"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 1.5rem; padding: 0px; list-style-type: circle;""><li class=""listitem""><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;""><em style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">memory_cost</em>&nbsp;(тип&nbsp;<span class=""type""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/language.types.integer.php"" class=""type integer"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">integer</a></span>) - Максимальный размер памяти (в байтах), которую можно использовать для вычисления хеша Argon2. По умолчанию&nbsp;<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">PASSWORD_ARGON2_DEFAULT_MEMORY_COST</code></span>.</p></li><li class=""listitem""><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;""><em style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">time_cost</em>&nbsp;(тип&nbsp;<span class=""type""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/language.types.integer.php"" class=""type integer"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">integer</a></span>) - Максимально возможное время которое можно потратить для вычисления хеша Argon2. По умолчанию&nbsp;<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">PASSWORD_ARGON2_DEFAULT_TIME_COST</code></span>.</p></li><li class=""listitem""><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;""><em style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">threads</em>&nbsp;(тип&nbsp;<span class=""type""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/language.types.integer.php"" class=""type integer"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">integer</a></span>) - Количество потоков, которые можно использовать для вычисления хеша Argon2. По умолчанию&nbsp;<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">PASSWORD_ARGON2_DEFAULT_THREADS</code></span>.</p></li></ul></div><div class=""refsect1 parameters"" id=""refsect1-function.password-hash-parameters"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Список параметров<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.password-hash.php#refsect1-function.password-hash-parameters"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><dl style=""margin-bottom: 0px;""><dt style=""height: 1.5rem;""><code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer;"">password</code></dt><dd style=""margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; padding: 0px 1.5rem;""><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Пользовательский пароль.</p><div class=""caution"" style=""padding: 0.75rem; margin: 1.5rem 0px; overflow: hidden; background: rgb(252, 252, 233); border-color: rgb(226, 226, 209); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; border-radius: 0px 0px 2px 2px;""><span class=""caution"" style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-weight: bolder; float: left; margin-right: 0.5rem; font-size: 1.125rem;"">Предостережение</span><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px;"">Использование алгоритма&nbsp;<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">PASSWORD_BCRYPT</code></span>&nbsp;приведёт к обрезанию поля&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer;"">password</code>&nbsp;до максимальной длины в 72 символа.</p></div></dd><dt style=""height: 1.5rem;""><code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer;"">algo</code></dt><dd style=""margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; padding: 0px 1.5rem;""><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/password.constants.php"" class=""link"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">Константа</a>, обозначающая используемый алгоритм хеширования пароля.</p></dd><dt style=""height: 1.5rem;""><code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer;"">options</code></dt><dd style=""margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; padding: 0px 1.5rem;""><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Ассоциативный массив с опциями. За документацией по поддерживаемым опциям для каждого алгоритма обратитесь к разделу ""<a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/password.constants.php"" class=""link"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">Константы алгоритмов хеширования паролей</a>"".</p><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Если не задано, то будет использована стандартная стоимость и соль будет генерироваться автоматически.</p></dd></dl></div><div class=""refsect1 returnvalues"" id=""refsect1-function.password-hash-returnvalues"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Возвращаемые значения<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.password-hash.php#refsect1-function.password-hash-returnvalues"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Возвращает хешированный пароль, или&nbsp;<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">FALSE</code></span>&nbsp;в случае возникновения ошибки.</p><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Использованный алгоритм, стоимость и соль будут возвращены как часть хеша. Таким образом, информация необходимая для проверки хеша будет в него включена. Это позволит функции&nbsp;<span class=""function""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.password-verify.php"" class=""function"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">password_verify()</a></span>&nbsp;проверять хеш без необходимости отдельного хранения информации о соли и алгоритме.</p></div><div class=""refsect1 examples"" id=""refsect1-function.password-hash-examples"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Примеры<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.password-hash.php#refsect1-function.password-hash-examples"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><div class=""example"" id=""example-980"" style=""margin: 1.5rem 0px;""><p style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">Пример #1 Пример использования&nbsp;<span class=""function""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">password_hash()</span></span></span></p><div class=""example-contents"" style=""margin-bottom: 1.5rem;""><div class=""phpcode"" style=""background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; border-radius: 0px 0px 2px 2px; padding: 0.75rem;""><code style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; display: block;""><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 0);""><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">&lt;?php<br></span><span style=""color: rgb(255, 128, 0);"">/**<br>&nbsp;*&nbsp;Мы&nbsp;просто&nbsp;хотим&nbsp;захешировать&nbsp;свой&nbsp;пароль&nbsp;используя&nbsp;настройки&nbsp;по&nbsp;умолчанию.<br>&nbsp;*&nbsp;Значит&nbsp;будет&nbsp;использован&nbsp;BCRYPT&nbsp;и&nbsp;результат&nbsp;будет&nbsp;60&nbsp;символов&nbsp;длиной.<br>&nbsp;*<br>&nbsp;*&nbsp;Помните,&nbsp;что&nbsp;алгоритм&nbsp;по&nbsp;умолчанию&nbsp;может&nbsp;измениться&nbsp;в&nbsp;будущем,&nbsp;так&nbsp;что<br>&nbsp;*&nbsp;имеет&nbsp;смысл&nbsp;заранее&nbsp;позаботиться&nbsp;о&nbsp;том,&nbsp;чтобы&nbsp;система&nbsp;хранения&nbsp;хешей<br>&nbsp;*&nbsp;смогла&nbsp;хранить&nbsp;более&nbsp;60&nbsp;символов&nbsp;(255&nbsp;в&nbsp;самый&nbsp;раз)<br>&nbsp;*/<br></span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">echo&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">password_hash</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">(</span><span style=""color: rgb(221, 0, 0);"">""rasmuslerdorf""</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">,&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">PASSWORD_DEFAULT</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">);<br></span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">?&gt;</span></span></code></div></div><div class=""example-contents"" style=""margin-bottom: 1.5rem;""><p style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Результатом выполнения данного примера будет что-то подобное:</p></div><div class=""example-contents screen"" style=""margin-bottom: 1.5rem; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; border-radius: 0px 0px 2px 2px; padding: 0.75rem;""><div class=""cdata""><pre style=""white-space: pre-wrap; margin-bottom: 0px;"">$2y$10$.vGA1O9wmRjrwAVXD98HNOgsNpDczlqm3Jq7KnEd1rVAGv3Fykk1a</pre></div></div></div></div>"	
"<span style=""color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);"">Создает хеш пароля</span>"	"<span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">string</span><span style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">&nbsp;</span><span class=""methodname"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">password_hash</span></span><span style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$password</code></span><span style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">&nbsp;[,&nbsp;</span><span class=""methodparam"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">array</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; margin: 0px;"">$options</code></span><span style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">&nbsp;] )</span>"	
"<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">hash</span>"	"<div class=""refnamediv"" style=""position: relative; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><p class=""refpurpose"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;""><span class=""dc-title"">Генерирует хеш-код (дайджест сообщения)</span></p></div><div class=""refsect1 description"" id=""refsect1-function.hash-description"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Описание<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.hash.php#refsect1-function.hash-description"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><div class=""methodsynopsis dc-description"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-size: 1rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px 0px 1.5rem; padding: 0.75rem; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; border-radius: 0px 0px 2px 2px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-color: rgb(217, 217, 217);""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<span class=""methodname""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">hash</span></span>&nbsp;(&nbsp;<span class=""methodparam""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$algo</code></span>&nbsp;,&nbsp;<span class=""methodparam""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$data</code></span>&nbsp;[,&nbsp;<span class=""methodparam""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">bool</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer; letter-spacing: -0.0625rem; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$raw_output</code><span class=""initializer"" style=""color: rgb(153, 51, 102);"">&nbsp;= false</span></span>&nbsp;] )</div></div><div class=""refsect1 parameters"" id=""refsect1-function.hash-parameters"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Список параметров<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.hash.php#refsect1-function.hash-parameters"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><dl style=""margin-bottom: 0px;""><dt style=""height: 1.5rem;""><code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer;"">algo</code></dt><dd style=""margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; padding: 0px 1.5rem;""><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Имя выбранного алгоритма хеширования (например, ""md5"", ""sha256"", ""haval160,4"" и т.д.)</p></dd><dt style=""height: 1.5rem;""><code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer;"">data</code></dt><dd style=""margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; padding: 0px 1.5rem;""><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Сообщение для хеширования.</p></dd><dt style=""height: 1.5rem;""><code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer;"">raw_output</code></dt><dd style=""margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; padding: 0px 1.5rem;""><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Когда установлено в&nbsp;<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">TRUE</code></span>, выводит необработанные двоичные данные. При&nbsp;<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">FALSE</code></span>&nbsp;выводит данные в шестнадцатеричной кодировке в нижнем регистре.</p></dd></dl></div><div class=""refsect1 returnvalues"" id=""refsect1-function.hash-returnvalues"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Возвращаемые значения<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.hash.php#refsect1-function.hash-returnvalues"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Возвращает строку содержащую вычисленный хеш-код в шестнадцатеричной кодировке в нижнем регистре. Если&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); cursor: pointer;"">raw_output</code>&nbsp;задан как&nbsp;<span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;""><code style=""font-weight: 700; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word;"">TRUE</code></span>, то возвращается хеш-код в виде бинарных данных.</p></div><div class=""refsect1 changelog"" id=""refsect1-function.hash-changelog"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Список изменений<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.hash.php#refsect1-function.hash-changelog"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><table class=""doctable informaltable"" style=""border-spacing: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 1.5rem; width: 1027px; border-color: rgb(204, 204, 204);""><thead><tr style=""border-width: 1px; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(196, 201, 223) rgb(196, 201, 223) rgb(136, 146, 191); border-image: initial;""><th style=""padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem; background-color: rgb(196, 201, 223);"">Версия</th><th style=""padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem; background-color: rgb(196, 201, 223);"">Описание</th></tr></thead><tbody class=""tbody""><tr style=""border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);""><td style=""vertical-align: top; padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem;"">5.4.0</td><td style=""vertical-align: top; padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem;"">Алгоритм Tiger теперь использует порядок байтов от старшего к младшему (big-endian). Смотрите пример ниже.</td></tr></tbody></table></div><div class=""refsect1 examples"" id=""refsect1-function.hash-examples"" style=""margin-bottom: 3rem; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><h3 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.25rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Примеры<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/function.hash.php#refsect1-function.hash-examples"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h3><div class=""example"" id=""example-924"" style=""margin: 1.5rem 0px;""><p style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">Пример #1 Пример использования&nbsp;<span class=""function""><span style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;"">hash()</span></span></span></p><div class=""example-contents"" style=""margin-bottom: 1.5rem;""><div class=""phpcode"" style=""background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; border-radius: 0px 0px 2px 2px; padding: 0.75rem;""><code style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; display: block;""><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 0);""><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">&lt;?php<br></span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">echo&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">hash</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">(</span><span style=""color: rgb(221, 0, 0);"">'ripemd160'</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">,&nbsp;</span><span style=""color: rgb(221, 0, 0);"">'The&nbsp;quick&nbsp;brown&nbsp;fox&nbsp;jumped&nbsp;over&nbsp;the&nbsp;lazy&nbsp;dog.'</span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 119, 0);"">);<br></span><span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 187);"">?&gt;</span></span></code></div></div><div class=""example-contents"" style=""margin-bottom: 1.5rem;""><p style=""margin-right: 0px; "<span style=""color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);"">Генерирует хеш-код (дайджест сообщения)</span>"	"<span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">string</span><span style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">&nbsp;</span><span class=""methodname"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">&nbsp;(&nbsp;</span><span class=""methodparam"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; margin: 0px;"">$algo</code></span><span style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">&nbsp;,&nbsp;</span><span class=""methodparam"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">string</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; word-spacing: -0.125rem; margin: 0px;"">$data</code></span><span style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;""><span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">bool</span>&nbsp;<code class=""parameter"" style=""font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: -1px; word-spacing: -2px;"">&nbsp;] )</span>"	
Make a defaultdict with a default value of 0	from collections import defaultdict<div><br /></div><div>d = defaultdict(lambda: 0)</div>	
If a function is stored in a variable, run it<div><br /></div><div>f = print</div>	f(1) # Just add parentheses	
What does CPython do?	"1. Read the text (command, file, ...)<div>2. Constructs a Abstract Syntax Tree (AST)</div><div>3. Converst the AST to intermediate bytecode&nbsp;</div><div>4. Which is executed by the virtual machine that translate it to OS/machine level instructions</div><div><br /></div><div><img src=""Screen Shot 2017-12-11 at 7.13.39 AM.png"" /></div>"	
What does byte code look like?	"<img src=""Screen Shot 2017-12-11 at 7.13.39 AM.png"" />"	
If you want to compare the 1st element in an iterable to the last element, when making all adjacent pairs comparsion.	<div><div>(iterable[i], iterable[i-1]&nbsp;for i in range(len(iterable))</div></div><div><br /></div><div>Python-specific trick: when i is 0, then iterable[i], iterable[i-1] gives us the wrap-around comparision between the first and last cities, because iterable[-1] is the last element of iterable.</div>	
The fastest way to uniqify a list of hashable objects&nbsp;	list(set(seq))	
The fastest way to uniqify a list of hashable objects and maintain order	list(dict.fromkeys(seq))	
When would you use a namedtuple instead of a class?	When there is only immutable data, and no methods<div><br /></div><div><div>from collections import namedtuple</div><div>Car = namedtuple('Car', 'color mileage')</div><div><br /></div><div>my_car = Car(color='red', mileage=3812.4)</div></div>	
"<span class=""classname"" style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-weight: bolder; color: rgb(51, 102, 153); font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14px;"">Iterator</span><br>"	"<div class=""section"" id=""iterator.intro"" style=""color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><p class=""para"" style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px;"">Интерфейс для внешних итераторов или объектов, которые могут повторять себя изнутри.</p></div><div class=""section"" id=""iterator.synopsis"" style=""color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);""><h2 class=""title"" style=""line-height: 3rem; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; margin-left: 0px; overflow: hidden; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-size: 1.5rem; color: rgb(121, 56, 98); position: relative; clear: both;"">Обзор интерфейсов<a class=""genanchor"" href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/class.iterator.php#iterator.synopsis"" style=""border-bottom: none; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-left: 0px; border-image: initial; color: transparent;"">&nbsp;¶</a></h2><div class=""classsynopsis"" style=""color: rgb(77, 77, 77); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.5rem; font-family: &quot;Fira Mono&quot;, &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, monospace; word-wrap: break-word; padding: 0.75rem; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; border-radius: 0px 0px 2px 2px; background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-color: rgb(217, 217, 217);""><div class=""ooclass""></div><div class=""classsynopsisinfo""><span class=""ooclass""><span class=""classname"" style=""text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; font-weight: bolder; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">Iterator</span>&nbsp;</span><span class=""ooclass""><span class=""modifier"" style=""color: rgb(153, 51, 102);"">extends</span>&nbsp;<a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/class.traversable.php"" class=""classname"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">Traversable</a>&nbsp;</span>{</div><div class=""classsynopsisinfo classsynopsisinfo_comment"" style=""margin-left: 1.5rem; margin-top: 1.5rem; color: rgb(255, 136, 0);"">/* Методы */</div><div class=""methodsynopsis dc-description"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); margin-left: 1.5rem;""><span class=""modifier"" style=""color: rgb(153, 51, 102);"">abstract</span>&nbsp;<span class=""modifier"" style=""color: rgb(153, 51, 102);"">public</span>&nbsp;<span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">mixed</span>&nbsp;<span class=""methodname""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/iterator.current.php"" class=""methodname"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">current</a></span>&nbsp;(&nbsp;<span class=""methodparam"">void</span>&nbsp;)</div><div class=""methodsynopsis dc-description"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); margin-left: 1.5rem;""><span class=""modifier"" style=""color: rgb(153, 51, 102);"">abstract</span>&nbsp;<span class=""modifier"" style=""color: rgb(153, 51, 102);"">public</span>&nbsp;<span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">scalar</span>&nbsp;<span class=""methodname""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/iterator.key.php"" class=""methodname"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">key</a></span>&nbsp;(&nbsp;<span class=""methodparam"">void</span>&nbsp;)</div><div class=""methodsynopsis dc-description"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); margin-left: 1.5rem;""><span class=""modifier"" style=""color: rgb(153, 51, 102);"">abstract</span>&nbsp;<span class=""modifier"" style=""color: rgb(153, 51, 102);"">public</span>&nbsp;<span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">void</span>&nbsp;<span class=""methodname""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/iterator.next.php"" class=""methodname"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid; color: rgb(51, 102, 153);"">next</a></span>&nbsp;(&nbsp;<span class=""methodparam"">void</span>&nbsp;)</div><div class=""methodsynopsis dc-description"" style=""color: rgb(115, 115, 115); margin-left: 1.5rem;""><span class=""modifier"" style=""color: rgb(153, 51, 102);"">abstract</span>&nbsp;<span class=""modifier"" style=""color: rgb(153, 51, 102);"">public</span>&nbsp;<span class=""type"" style=""color: rgb(102, 153, 51);"">void</span>&nbsp;<span class=""methodname""><a href=""http://php.net/manual/ru/iterator.rewind.php"" class=""methodname"" style=""border-bottom: 1px solid;
