When is map not faster than listcomp?	When using a lambda.<div><br /></div><div><div>$ python -mtimeit -s'xs=range(10)' 'map(lambda x: x+2, xs)'</div><div>100000 loops, best of 3: 4.24 usec per loop</div><div><br /></div><div>$ python -mtimeit -s'xs=range(10)' '[x+2 for x in xs]'</div><div>100000 loops, best of 3: 2.32 usec per loop</div></div>	
What is a good name for a generic list of lists?	lol<div><br /></div><div>lol = [['a', 'b', 'c'], ['b', 'c', 'd'], ['d', 'e']]</div>	
Which is more accurate?<div><br /></div><div>x ** 0.5</div><div>math.sqrt(x)</div>	math.sqrt(x) # Specialized functions are typically better<div><br /></div><div><div>x = 7827</div><div>print(x ** 0.5)</div><div>print(math.sqrt(x))</div><div>print(decimal.Decimal(x).sqrt())</div></div>	
How would you get as many digits as possible?	<div>import decimal</div><div><br /></div><div>x = 7827</div>print(decimal.Decimal(x).sqrt())	
Which is more accurate?<div><br /></div><div>log2(n)</div><div>log(n, 2)</div>	log2 # Specialized functions are typically more accurate than general functions<div><br /></div><div><div>assert all(log2(2**p) == p for p in range(1024))</div><div><br /></div><div>assert not all(log(2**p, 2) == p for p in range(1024))</div></div>	
Use dataclasses to make an InventoryItem<div><br /></div><div>item = InventoryItem('hammers', 10.49, 12)</div>	<div>from dataclasses import dataclass</div><div><br /></div><div>@dataclass</div><div>class InventoryItem:</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; name: str</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; unit_price: float</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; quantity_on_hand: int = 0</div>	
What is the difference between Cython and Numba?	Both compile Python into C<div><br /></div><div>Cypthon is&nbsp;an ahead-of-time compiler.</div><div>Numba is a just-in-time compiler.</div>	
What are&nbsp;dataclasses?	Mutable named tuple with defaults	
Run another Python program in Python program	"<div>exec(open(""./filename.py"").read()) # Hacky and unsecure</div><div><br /></div><div>import filename.py # Is better</div>"	
What is the common example of a tuple in Python?	return multiple items from a function	
raise a generic error	"raise Exception(""I'm a generic error"")&nbsp;"	
Get path to home directory	<div>from pathlib import Path</div><div><br /></div><div>home = str(Path.home())</div>	
"What does it mean that ""iterators are iterable""?"	In Python, everything that is iterator can be be passed to something else that takes in an iterator. They are compossible.<div><br /></div><div>eg:&nbsp;list(zip(range(10), range(0, -10, -1)))</div>	
What is the difference between np.arange and np.linspace?	<div>Both&nbsp;return evenly spaced values within a given interval.</div><div><br /></div>import numpy as np<div><br /></div><div># Arange does it by step</div><div><div>np.arange(3, 8, step=2) #=&gt;&nbsp;array([3, 5, 7])</div><div><br /># Linspace does it by number of elements</div></div><div>np.linspace(3, 8, num=5) #=&gt;&nbsp;array([3. &nbsp;, 4.25, 5.5 , 6.75, 8. &nbsp;])&nbsp;</div>	
array_change_key_case	Changes the case of all keys in an array	array-function
array_chunk	Split an array into chunks	array-function
array_column	Return the values from a single column in the input array	array-function
array_combine	Creates an array by using one array for keys and another for its values	array-function
array_count_values	Counts all the values of an array	array-function
array_diff	Computes the difference of arrays	array-function
array_diff_assoc	Computes the difference of arrays with additional index check	array-function
array_diff_key	Computes the difference of arrays using keys for comparison	array-function
array_diff_uassoc	Computes the difference of arrays with additional index check which is performed by a user supplied callback function	array-function
array_diff_ukey	Computes the difference of arrays using a callback function on the keys for comparison	array-function
array_fill	Fill an array with values	array-function
array_fill_keys	Fill an array with values, specifying keys	array-function
array_filter	Filters elements of an array using a callback function	array-function
array_flip	Exchanges all keys with their associated values in an array	array-function
array_intersect	Computes the intersection of arrays	array-function
array_intersect_assoc	Computes the intersection of arrays with additional index check	array-function
array_intersect_key	Computes the intersection of arrays using keys for comparison	array-function
array_intersect_uassoc	Computes the intersection of arrays with additional index check, compares indexes by a callback function	array-function
array_intersect_ukey	Computes the intersection of arrays using a callback function on the keys for comparison	array-function
array_keys	Return all the keys or a subset of the keys of an array	array-function
array_key_exists	Checks if the given key or index exists in the array	array-function
array_key_first	Gets the first key of an array	array-function
array_key_last	Gets the last key of an array	array-function
array_map	Applies the callback to the elements of the given arrays	array-function
array_merge	Merge one or more arrays	array-function
array_merge_recursive	Merge one or more arrays recursively	array-function
array_multisort	Sort multiple or multi-dimensional arrays	array-function
array_pad	Pad array to the specified length with a value	array-function
array_pop	Pop the element off the end of array	array-function
array_product	Calculate the product of values in an array	array-function
array_push	Push one or more elements onto the end of array	array-function
array_rand	Pick one or more random keys out of an array	array-function
array_reduce	Iteratively reduce the array to a single value using a callback function	array-function
array_replace	Replaces elements from passed arrays into the first array	array-function
array_replace_recursive	Replaces elements from passed arrays into the first array recursively	array-function
array_reverse	Return an array with elements in reverse order	array-function
array_search	Searches the array for a given value and returns the first corresponding key if successful	array-function
array_shift	Shift an element off the beginning of array	array-function
array_slice	Extract a slice of the array	array-function
array_splice	Remove a portion of the array and replace it with something else	array-function
array_sum	Calculate the sum of values in an array	array-function
array_udiff	Computes the difference of arrays by using a callback function for data comparison	array-function
array_udiff_assoc	Computes the difference of arrays with additional index check, compares data by a callback function	array-function
array_udiff_uassoc	Computes the difference of arrays with additional index check, compares data and indexes by a callback function	array-function
array_uintersect	Computes the intersection of arrays, compares data by a callback function	array-function
array_uintersect_assoc	Computes the intersection of arrays with additional index check, compares data by a callback function	array-function
array_uintersect_uassoc	Computes the intersection of arrays with additional index check, compares data and indexes by separate callback functions	array-function
array_unique	Removes duplicate values from an array	array-function
array_unshift	Prepend one or more elements to the beginning of an array	array-function
array_values	Return all the values of an array	array-function
array_walk	Apply a user supplied function to every member of an array	array-function
array_walk_recursive	Apply a user function recursively to every member of an array	array-function
arsort	Sort an array in reverse order and maintain index association	array-function
什么是表（table）？	"<div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">表的特点</font></b></div><div><font color=""#ff5500"">表的名字：</font>表在该数据库中名字是唯一的</div><div><font color=""#ff5500"">表的结构：</font>表是一种结构化的文件，可用来存储某种特定类型的数据</div><div><div><font color=""#ff5500"">表的数据：</font>存储在表中的数据是一种类型的数据或一个清单，决不应该将顾客的清单与订单的清单存储在同一个数据库表中</div></div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">表的结构</font></b></div><div><img src=""09030127-13657abaf11945d1916297e6d23f2ec9.png"" /></div><div><div>表头(header): 每一列的名称;</div><div>列(row): 具有相同数据类型的数据的集合;</div><div>行(col): 每一行用来描述某个人/物的具体信息;</div><div>值(value): 行的具体信息, 每个值必须与该列的数据类型相同;</div><div>键(key): 表中用来识别某个特定的人\物的方法, 键的值在当前列中具有唯一性。</div></div>"	SQL必知必会
什是列（column）？什么是行（row）？	"<div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">列（column）</font></b></div><div>表中的一个字段。所有表都是由一个或多个列组成的。</div><div>例如，在顾客表中，一个列存储着顾客编号，另一个列存储着顾客名。</div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">行（row）</font></b></div><div>表中的一个记录</div><div>例如，顾客表可以每行存储一个顾客。表中的行数为记录的总数</div><div><br /></div><div><img src=""paste-102946071117825.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会
什么是主键（primary key）？	<div>一列（或一组列），其值能够唯一区分表中每个行。</div><div><br /></div><div>表中的任何列都可以作为主键，只要它满足以下条件：</div><div> 任意两行都不具有相同的主键值</div><div> 每个行都必须具有一个主键值（主键列不允许NULL值）。</div>	SQL必知必会
主键的最好习惯	<div>除MySQL强制实施的规则外，应该坚持的几个普遍认可的最好习惯为：</div><div> 不更新主键列中的值；</div><div> 不重用主键列的值；</div><div><div> 不在主键列中使用可能会更改的值。（例如，如果使用一个</div><div>名字作为主键以标识某个供应商，当该供应商合并和更改其</div><div>名字时，必须更改这个主键。）</div></div>	SQL必知必会
查看当前可用数据库	"show databases; &nbsp; 返回可用数据库的一个列表<div><img src=""paste-104457899606017.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会
查看MySQL一个数据库内的所有表	"show tables; &nbsp; 获得一个数据库内的表的列表<div><img src=""paste-104981885616129.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会
显示来自 表coustomers 的所有列（columns）	"show culumns from customers;<div><img src=""paste-105480101822465.jpg"" /></div><div><div>字段名、数据类型、是否允许NULL、键信息、默认值以及其他信息</div></div>"	SQL必知必会
返回一列的所有数据	SELECT column_name&nbsp;<div>FROM tablename;<div><div>一、将返回表中该列的所有行。</div><div>二、数据没有过滤</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; （过滤用WHERE或HAVING。过滤将得出结果集的一个子集）</div><div>三、数据也没有排序</div></div></div>	SQL必知必会
如何结束SQL语句？	多条SQL语句必须以分号（；）分隔。<div><div>使用的是mysql命令行，必须加上分号来结束SQL语句。</div></div><div>单条SQL语名一般不需要加上分号，但加上也没有坏处</div>	SQL必知必会
SQL语句的大小写	SQL语句不区分大小写<div>为了方便代码阅读和调试。一般SQL关键字使用大写，对所有的列和表名使用小写</div>	SQL必知必会
"检索多个列<div>检查products的prod_id &nbsp;prod_name &nbsp;prod_price</div><div><img src=""paste-235776524681217.jpg"" /></div>"	"SELECT col_name1, col_name2 FROM tablename;<div><img src=""paste-112730006618113.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会
检索所有列	SELECT * FROM tablename;<div>如果给定一个通配符（*），则返回表中所有列。列的顺序一般是列在表定义中出现的顺序。但有时候并不是这样的，表的模式的变化（如添加或删除列）可能会导致顺序的变化。</div>	SQL必知必会
检索 值不同的行	"<div>DISTINCT关键字，顾名思义，此关键字指示MySQL只返回不同的值。</div><div><br /></div><font color=""#ff5500""><b>SELECT DISTINCT col_name1&nbsp;</b></font><div><font color=""#ff5500""><b>FROM tablename;</b></font><div><div><br /></div><div>注意：DISTINCT关键字用于所有的列，不仅仅是跟在其后的那一列</div><div><br /></div></div></div>"	SQL必知必会
限制返回结果数目 ，不多于10行，行3开始的4行的两种表示	"SELECT col_name&nbsp;<div>FROM tablename&nbsp;</div><div>LIMIT 10;<div><br /></div><div><br /></div><div>SELECT col_name&nbsp;</div><div>FROM tablename&nbsp;</div><div>LIMIT 3,4&nbsp;</div><div><br /></div><div>SELECT col_name</div><div>FROM tablename&nbsp;</div><div>LIMIT 4 OFFSET 3;</div><div><br /></div><div><img src=""paste-114220360269825.jpg"" /></div></div>"	SQL必知必会
使用注释	"SELECT col_name FROM tablename;<font color=""#797f99""> --这是注释</font>"	SQL必知必会
什么是子句（clause）？	<div>&nbsp;SQL语句由子句构成，有些子句是必需的，而有的是可选的。</div><div><div>一个子句通常由一个关键字和所提供的数据组成。</div></div><div><br /></div><div>子句的例子有SELECT语句的</div><div>FROM子句</div><div>WHERE 子句</div><div>LIKE 子句</div>	SQL必知必会
ORDER BY 子句	"为了明确地排序用SELECT语句检索出的数据，可使用ORDER BY子句。&nbsp;ORDER BY默认是升序排序。<div>注意：在指定一条ORDER BY子句时，应该保证它是ELECT语句中最后一条子句。如果不是最后一条子句，将会出现错误信息</div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">单列</font></b></div><div>SELECT col_name&nbsp;</div><div>FROM tablename&nbsp;</div><div>ORDER BY col_name;</div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">多个列排序</font></b></div><div><div>SELECT col_name1, col_name2, col_name3&nbsp;</div><div>FROM tablename&nbsp;</div><div>ORDER BY col_name1, col_name2;</div></div><div><br /></div>"	SQL必知必会
指定排序方向<div><br /></div><div>表 tablename</div><div>列 col_name1, col_name2, col_name3&nbsp;</div><div>问一：按col_name1降序排序</div><div>问二：按col_name1降序排序，, col_name2升序排序</div>	"默认数据排序方式是升序。<div>DESC关键字进行降序排序。</div><div>注意：DESC 关键词只应用到直接位于其前面的列名。如果想在多个列上进行降序排序，必须对每一列指定DESC关键词。</div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">单列</font></b></div><div>SELECT col_name&nbsp;</div><div>FROM tablename&nbsp;</div><div>ORDER BY col_name DESC;</div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">多列</font></b></div><div><div>SELECT col_name1, col_name2, col_name3&nbsp;</div><div>FROM tablename&nbsp;</div><div>ORDER BY col_name1 DESC, col_name2;</div></div>"	SQL必知必会
ASC关键字	与DESC相反的关键字是ASC（ASCENDING）<div>但实际上，ASC没有多大用处，因为升序是默认的</div>	SQL必知必会
使用WHERE子句过滤数据<div>查找products表 价格（prod_price）为2.5的商品名(prod_name)</div>	"<div>在SELECT语句中，数据根据WHERE子句中指定的搜索条件进行过滤。</div><div>WHERE子句在表名（FROM子句）之后给出</div><div><br /></div><div>SELECT col_name1, col_name2&nbsp;</div><div>FROM tablename&nbsp;</div><div>WHERE col_name1 = 3.49;</div><div>这条语句只返回col_name1值为3.49的行。</div><div><br /></div><div><img src=""paste-118163140247553.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会
WHERE子句操作符	"<table> <tbody> <tr><td>操作符</td><td>说 明 </td></tr><tr><td>=</td><td>等于 </td></tr><tr><td>&lt;&gt;</td><td>不等于 </td></tr><tr><td>!=</td><td>不等于 </td></tr><tr><td>&lt;</td><td>小于 </td></tr><tr><td>&lt; =</td><td>小于等于 </td></tr><tr><td>!&lt;</td><td>不小于 </td></tr><tr><td>&gt;</td><td>大于 </td></tr><tr><td>&gt;=</td><td>大于等于 </td></tr><tr><td>!&gt;</td><td>不大于 </td></tr><tr><td>BETWEEN</td><td>在指定的两个值之间 </td></tr><tr><td>IS NULL</td><td>为NULL值 </td></tr></tbody> </table><br /><div>我分为四种类型：比较，范围，是否为空，逻辑判断</div><div><br /><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">BETWEEN AND 操作符</font></b><br /><div><div>SELECT col_name, col_name2&nbsp;</div><div>FROM tablename&nbsp;</div><div>WHERE co_name2&nbsp;<font color=""#ff5500"">BETWEEN</font> 5 <font color=""#ff5500"">AND</font> 10;</div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">IS NULL 操作符</font></b></div><div>SELECT col_name&nbsp;</div><div>FROM tablename&nbsp;</div><div>WHERE col_name <font color=""#ff5500"">IS NULL</font>;</div><div><br /></div><div>SELECT col_name1&nbsp;</div><div>FROM tablename&nbsp;</div><div>WHERE col_name2 <font color=""#ff5500"">IS NULL</font>; --用另一个列来做过滤条件很常用</div></div></div></div>"	SQL必知必会
组合WHERE子句 操作符也称为？	<div>操作符（operator） 用来联结或改变WHERE子句中的子句的关键字。</div><div>也称为逻辑操作符（logical operator）。</div>	SQL必知必会
组合WHERE子句 &nbsp;AND操作符	"<div>为了通过不止一个列进行过滤，可使用AND操作符给WHERE子句附加条件。</div><div>用来指示检索满足所有给定条件的行</div><div><br /></div><font color=""#ff5500"">SELECT</font> col_name1, col_name2, col_name3&nbsp;<div><font color=""#ff5500"">FROM</font> tablename&nbsp;<div><font color=""#ff5500"">WHERE</font> col_name1='ABC' <font color=""#ff5500"">AND</font> col_name2 &lt;= 4;</div></div>"	SQL必知必会
组合WHERE子句 &nbsp;OR操作符	"<div><div>OR WHERE子句中使用的关键字，用来表示检索匹配任一给定条件的行。</div></div><div><br /></div><font color=""#ff5500"">SELECT</font> col_name1, col_name2, col_name3&nbsp;<div><font color=""#ff5500"">FROM</font> tablename</div><div><font color=""#ff5500"">WHERE</font> col_name1='ABC' <font color=""#ff5500"">OR</font> col_name2 &lt;= 4;</div>"	SQL必知必会
组合WHERE子句 &nbsp;and 与 or 的计算次序	"WHERE子句可以包含任意数目的AND和OR操作符。允许两者结合以进行复杂、高级的过滤。<div>注意：SQL在处理OR操作符前，优先处理AND操作符。使用圆括号即可解决此问题。</div><div>圆括号具有较AND或OR操作符高的计算次序</div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">优先级:</font></b> &nbsp;圆括号() &gt; AND &gt; OR</div><div><br /></div><div>用圆括号前</div><div><img src=""paste-122599841464321.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div>用圆括号后</div><div><img src=""paste-122681445842945.jpg"" /></div><div><img src=""paste-122694330744833.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会
组合WHERE子句 &nbsp;IN操作符	<div>IN操作符用来指定条件范围，范围中的每个条件都可以进行匹配</div><div><div>IN取合法值的由逗号分隔的清单，全都括在圆括号中。</div></div><div><br /></div><div>SELECT prod_name, prod_price&nbsp;</div><div>FROM Products&nbsp;</div><div>WHERE vend_in IN ('DLL01', 'BSLKJL')&nbsp;</div><div>ORDER BY prod_name;</div><div><br /></div><div>实际上，IN操作符完成了与OR相同的功能。</div><div>但IN可以包含其他SELECT语句。</div><div>比用OR简洁，</div><div>执行更快</div>	SQL必知必会
组合WHERE子句 &nbsp;NOT操作符	"WHERE子句中的NOT操作符有且只有一个功能，那就是否定其后所跟的任何条件。<div><div><br /></div><div>SELECT prod_name&nbsp;</div><div>FROM Products&nbsp;</div><div>WHERE NOT vend_id='DNGH01'&nbsp;</div><div>ORDER BY prod_name;</div></div><div><br /></div><div><img src=""paste-128423817117697.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会
组合WHERE子句 &nbsp;LIKE操作符之百分号（%）通配符	"%表示任何字符出现任意次数。<div><div>%还能匹配0个字符。</div><div>注意：%不能匹配NULL。</div></div><div><br /></div><div><font color=""#ff5500""><b>匹配开头</b></font><br /><div><img src=""paste-135072426491905.jpg"" /></div></div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">匹配任意位置</font></b></div><div><img src=""paste-138126148239361.jpg"" /></div><div><img src=""paste-138723148693505.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">出以's'起头以'e'结尾</font></b></div><div><img src=""paste-139985869078529.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会
用通配符进行过滤	<div>为了在搜索子句中使用通配符，必须使用LIKE操作符。</div><div>注意：通配符搜索只能用于文本字段（字符串），非文本数据字段不能使用通配符搜索。</div>	SQL必知必会
组合WHERE子句 &nbsp;LIKE操作符之下划线(_)通配符	"下划线的用途与%一样，但它只匹配单个字符，而不是多个字符。<div>_总是刚好匹配一个字符，不能多也不能少。</div><div><img src=""paste-141175575019521.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会
组合WHERE子句 &nbsp;LIKE操作符之使用通配符技巧	<div>代价：通配符搜索的处理一般要比前面讨论的其他搜索所花时间更长</div><div><br /></div><div><div> 不要过度使用通配符。</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; 如果其他操作符能达到相同的目的，应该使用其他操作符。</div></div><div><br /></div><div><div> 不要把通配符用在搜索模式的开始处</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; 在确实需要使用通配符时，除非绝对有必要，否则不要把它们用在搜索模式的开始处。把通配符置于搜索模式的开始处，搜索起来是最慢的。</div></div><div><br /></div><div> 仔细注意通配符的位置。如果放错地方，可能不会返回想要的数据</div>	SQL必知必会
组合WHERE子句 &nbsp;LIKE操作符之方括号([])通配符	方括号通配符用来指定一个字符集，他必须匹配指定位置的一个字符。类似正则表达式中的[]<div><br /></div><div>例如匹配J或M开头的任意cust_contact</div><div>SELECT Customers&nbsp;</div><div>FROM Products&nbsp;</div><div>WHERE cust_contact LIKE '[JM]%'&nbsp;</div><div>ORDER BY cust_contact;</div><div><br /></div><div>方括号通配符可以使用^来否定。</div><div>SELECT Customers&nbsp;</div><div>FROM Products&nbsp;</div><div>WHERE cust_contact LIKE '[^JM]%'&nbsp;</div><div>ORDER BY cust_contact;</div>	SQL必知必会
用正则表达式进行搜索	"<div>REGEXP 关键字 后面跟正则表达式语句</div><img src=""paste-148700357722113.jpg"" /><div><br /></div>"	SQL必知必会
让正则表达式REGEXP的匹配区分大小写	使用BINARY关键字，让正则表达式的匹配区分大小写<div>添加在REGEXP 后面</div><div><div>WHERE prod_name REGEXP&nbsp;BINARY 'JetPack .000'。</div></div>	SQL必知必会
REGEXP 和 LIKE 的区别	LIKE匹配整个列，如果匹配的值不与列的值完全一致，则没有数据返回<div>LIKE 如何变成 REGEXP? 加上百分号%通配符</div><div><br /></div><div>REGEXP在列值内进行匹配，只要匹配的值在列的值出现，就返回数据。</div><div>REGEXP 如何变成 LIEK? 加上 ^ 和 $ 定位符</div>	SQL必知必会
mysql 中 REGEXP 的转义	"用双斜杠 \\ 进行转义<div><br /><div>\\. &nbsp;表示 &nbsp;.</div><div><img src=""paste-153287382794241.jpg"" /></div></div><div><br /></div><div><img src=""paste-153308857630721.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会
"拼接字段<div><br /><div>拼接vendors表的vend_name和vend_country</div><div>并以vend_name排序</div><div><br /></div><div><img src=""paste-263942920208385.jpg"" /></div></div>"	"<div>在MySQL的SELECT语句中，可使用Concat()函数来拼接两个列</div><div><img src=""paste-154541513244673.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会
拼接字段并删除多余的空格	"使用MySQL的Trim()函数来删除多余的空格<div>LTrim() 删除左边多余的空格</div><div>RTrim() 删除右边多余的空格</div><div><br /><div><img src=""paste-155439161409537.jpg"" /></div></div>"	SQL必知必会
使用别名	"<div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">别名用AS关键字赋予</font></b></div>别名有时也称为导出列（derived column）。别名是一个字段或值的替换名。<div><div>为了便于理解别名不应该使用表中实际的列名，。虽然这样做并非不合法</div></div><div><br /><div><img src=""paste-158746286227457.jpg"" /></div></div>"	SQL必知必会
"执行算术操作符计算<div><br /></div><div>查找订单号为20005的所有产品的prod_id,quantity,item_price</div><div>以及每个产品的总价，别名为expanded_price</div><div><br /></div><div>orderitems表</div><div><img src=""paste-264716014321665.jpg"" /></div>"	"计算字段的另一常见用途是对检索出的数据进行算术计算<div><img src=""paste-159807143149569.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div><img src=""paste-159832912953345.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会

文本处理函数之将发音类似匹配<div>查找customers表中cust_contact发音为'Y.lie'的cust_name,cust_contact<br /></div>	"<div>SOUNDEX是一个将任何文本串转换为描述其语音表示的字母数字模式的算法</div><div><img src=""paste-163711268421633.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会
常用的文本处理函数	"<img src=""paste-163788577832961.jpg"" /><div><img src=""paste-163801462734849.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会
日期和时间处理函数之Date()函数	"对于年份的格式应该总是使用4位数字的年份，这样更可靠，尽管MySQL支持2位数的年份。<div><div>日期格式最好为 yyyy-mm-dd</div><div><img src=""paste-164785010245633.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div><div>如果你想要的仅是日期，则使用Date()是一个良好的习惯，即使你知道相应的列只包含日期也是如此。</div></div><div><div>这样，如果由于某种原因表中以后除了日期还增加了时间值，你的SQL代码也不用改变</div></div></div><div><br /></div><div>如果只要时间值可用Time()函数</div>"	SQL必知必会
"日期和时间处理函数之用Date()函数进行范围搜索<div><br /></div><div>检索orders表2015年9月份的order_num和cust_id</div><div><img src=""paste-261280040484865.jpg"" /></div>"	"只检索2005年9月<div><br /></div><div>用 BETWEEN &nbsp; AND 操作符</div><div><img src=""paste-169165876887553.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div>Year()指定年份，Month()指定月份</div><div><img src=""paste-169238891331585.jpg"" /></div><div><img src=""paste-169273251069953.jpg"" /></div><div>此方法不用记住每个月有多少天，2月的在润年还是平年</div>"	SQL必知必会
常用日期和时间处理函数	"<img src=""paste-170475841912833.jpg"" />"	SQL必知必会
常用的数值处理函数	"<div>数值处理函数仅处理数值数据。这些函数一般主要用于代数、三角或几何运算，因此没有串或日期—时间处理函数的使用那么频繁</div><div><br /></div><div><img src=""paste-170694885244929.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会
什么是聚集函数？	聚集函数（aggregate function）：运行在行组上，计算和返回单个值的函数	SQL必知必会
聚集函数之计算平均值	"AVG()函数返回平均值 &nbsp;&nbsp;列值之和/行数<div><div>为了获得多个列的平均值，必须使用多个AVG()函数</div><div>AVG()函数忽略列值为NULL的行。</div><div><br /></div><div><img src=""paste-171352015241217.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div>也可用 where 过滤出特定行或列之后使用</div></div>"	SQL必知必会
聚集函数之计算特定行的平均值<div><br /><div>计算 products表的vend_id为1003的prod_price 的平均值</div><div>起别名为 avg_price</div></div>	"<div>返回特定供应商所提供产品的平均价格：</div><div><img src=""paste-171717087461377.jpg"" /></div><div><img src=""paste-171906066022401.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会
聚集函数之对数目进行计数	"<div>COUNT()函数进行计数。</div><div>可利用COUNT()确定表中行的数目或符合特定条件的行的数目。</div><div><br /></div><div>对表中行的数目进行计数 ：&nbsp;COUNT(*)不管列中是否为NULL</div><div><img src=""paste-175458003976193.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div>对特定列中具有值的行进行计数：COUNT(column)会忽略NULL值</div><div><img src=""paste-175818781229057.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div>"	SQL必知必会
聚集函数之返回最大值、最小值	"MAX()返回指定列中的最大值<div>MIN()返回指定列中的最小值</div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">特性</font></b></div><div>一、MAX()函数和MIN()函数都要求指定列名</div><div><div>二、可应用于文本列中</div></div><div>三、忽略列值为NULL的行</div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">最大值</font></b></div><div><img src=""paste-176239688024065.jpg"" /><br /><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">最小值</font></b></div><div><img src=""paste-176312702468097.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会
聚集函数之计算列值的和<div><br /></div><div>一、计算 orderitems表order_num为20005的quantity总和</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;输出列名为items_ordered</div><div>二、计算 orderitems表order_num为20005的item_price*quantity总和</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 输出列名为total_price</div>	"SUM()函数用来返回指定列值的和（总计）<div>SUM()函数忽略列值为NULL的行<br /><div><br /></div><div>计算某物品数量之和<br /><div><img src=""paste-178047869255681.jpg"" /></div><div><img src=""paste-178120883699713.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div>计算某物品总金额（sum(数量*单价)）</div></div><div><img src=""paste-178477365985281.jpg"" /></div></div>"	SQL必知必会
聚集函数之参数	"<b><font color=""#ff5500"">ALL参数：</font></b><div>对所有的行执行计算，ALL是默认行为<div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">DISTINCT参数：&nbsp;</font></b></div><div>一、只包含不同的值。不指定DISTINCT参数则假定为ALL</div><div>二、DISTINCT必须使用列名，不能用于计算或表达式</div><div><div>三、使用COUNT（DISTINCT），会产生错误</div></div><div>四、将DISTINCT用于MIN()和MAX()没有价值</div><div><br /></div><div><div>平均值只考虑各个不同的价格</div></div><div><img src=""paste-179228985262081.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div></div>"	SQL必知必会
聚集函数之组合	"<div>SELECT语句可根据需要包含多个聚集函数</div><div><img src=""paste-180375741530113.jpg"" /><br /><img src=""paste-180388626432001.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div>"	SQL必知必会
"分组数据之创建分组<div>查找products表中的vend_id列</div><div>并统计其值出现的次数，用分组显行，分组名设为num_prods</div><div><img src=""paste-233654810836993.jpg"" /></div>"	"分组是在SELECT语句的GROUP BY子句中建立的<div>GROUP BY子句必须出现在WHERE子句之后，ORDER BY子句之前</div><div><br /><div><img src=""paste-185284889149441.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div></div>"	SQL必知必会
分组数据之过滤分组<div><br /></div><div>对orders表的 cust_id 进行分组，并选出行数大于2的cust_id</div><div>输出cust_id，cust_id统计的行数（别名为orders）</div>	"HAVING非常类似于WHERE，但WHERE过滤指定的是行而不是分组，WHERE没有分组的概念<div><div>事实上，目前为止所学过的所有类型的WHERE子句都可以用HAVING来替代</div></div><div><div>唯一的差别是WHERE过滤行，而HAVING过滤分组。</div></div><div><br /></div><div><img src=""paste-187526862077953.jpg"" /></div><div><img src=""paste-187548336914433.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div>同时使用 WHERE 与 HAVING</div><div><img src=""paste-187698660769793.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div>"	SQL必知必会
分组和排序 &nbsp;GROUP BY &nbsp;和 ORDER BY 的区别	"<table> <tbody style=""     font-size: x-large; ""> <tr><td><b><font color=""#ff5500"">ORDER BY</font></b></td><td><b><font color=""#ff5500"">GROUP BY </font></b></td></tr><tr><td>对产生的输出排序</td><td>对行分组，单输出可能不是分组的排序 </td></tr><tr><td>任意列都可以使用(甚至非选择的列也可以)</td><td>只可能使用选择列或表达式列，而且必须使用每个选择列的表达式 </td></tr><tr><td style=""     font-size: x-large; "">不一定需要</td><td>如果与聚集函数一起使用列(或表达式)，则必须使用 </td></tr></tbody> </table><img src=""paste-192431714729985.jpg"" /><br /><div><br /></div>"	SQL必知必会
SQL子句顺序	"<table> <tbody style=""     font-size: 20px; ""> <tr><td><b><font color=""#ff5500"">子句</font></b></td><td><b><font color=""#ff5500"">说明</font></b></td><td><b><font color=""#ff5500"">是否必须使用 </font></b></td></tr><tr><td>SELECT</td><td>要返回的列或表达式</td><td>是 </td></tr><tr><td>FROM</td><td>从中检索数据的表</td><td>仅在从表选择数据时使用 </td></tr><tr><td>WHERE</td><td>行级过滤</td><td>否 </td></tr><tr><td>GROUP BY</td><td>分组说明</td><td>仅在按组计算聚集时使用 </td></tr><tr><td>HAVING</td><td>组级过滤</td><td>否 </td></tr><tr><td>ORDER BY</td><td>输出排序顺序</td><td>否 </td></tr></tbody> </table><br />"	SQL必知必会
SQL子句执行顺序	FROM<div>WHERE</div><div>GROUP BY</div><div>HAVING</div><div>SELECT</div><div>DISTINCT</div><div>ORDER BY</div>	SQL必知必会
子查询	子查询即嵌套在其他查询中的查询<div>用于关系表中</div><div>最外层查询为所需的结果</div>	SQL必知必会
"利用子查询进行过滤<div>通过<font color=""#ff5500""> 物品TNT2</font> 查找 <font color=""#ff5500"">客户信息</font></div><div><br /></div><div>orderitems表</div><div><img src=""paste-414056322170881.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div>orders表</div><div><img src=""paste-414494408835073.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div>customers表</div><div><img src=""paste-414777876676609.jpg"" /></div>"	"用于WHERE 后面 一般与IN操作符结合使用<div><br /></div><div><div><div>通过 物品TNT2 查找 客户信息</div><div>物品TNT2 -&gt; 订单编号 -&gt; 客户ID -&gt; 客户信息</div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">分开查&nbsp;</font></b></div><div>1、检索包含物品TNT2的所有订单的编号</div><div><img src=""paste-331086143946753.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div>2、检索上面订单编号的所有客户的ID</div><div><img src=""paste-331180633227265.jpg"" /></div><div>3、检索上面客户ID的所有客户信息</div><div><img src=""paste-331897892765697.jpg"" /></div><div><img src=""paste-331919367602177.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">用子查询</font></b></div><div>结合1、2、3，把1变成2的子查询，把2变成3的子查询</div><div><img src=""paste-331940842438657.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div><br /></div></div></div>"	SQL必知必会
14.3 作为计算字段使用子查询 P93	<div>需要显示customers表每个客户的订单总数</div><div>订单与相应的客户ID存储在orders表中</div><div><br /></div><div><br /></div>	SQL必知必会 未完成
主键	"<div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">主键&nbsp;（primary key）</font></b></div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;唯一标识一条记录，不能有重复的，不允许为NULL</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;可以有多个候选索引，但只有一个主键</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;要删除一张表中的主键必须首先要确保其它表中的没有相同外键</div>"	SQL必知必会
外键	"<div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">外键（foreign key）</font></b></div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; 一表的外键是另一表的主键</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; 是用于建立和加强两个表数据之间的链接的一列或多列</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;外键可以有重复的, 可以是空值</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; 外键约束主要用来维护两个表之间数据的一致性</div>"	SQL必知必会
"创建联结&nbsp;等值联结<div><div>查找vend_name、prod_name、prod_price</div><div>并按vend_name、prod_name排序</div><div><br /></div><div>products 表</div><div><img src=""paste-379563439816705.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div>vendors 表</div><div><img src=""paste-380164735238145.jpg"" /></div></div>"	"<div>等值联结（equijoin），它基于两个表之间的相等测试。</div><div>这种联结也称为内部联结</div><div><img src=""paste-365475947085825.jpg"" /></div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<img src=""paste-386594301280257.jpg"" /></div><div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">SELECT语句中</font></b></div><div>两个列（prod_name和prod_price）在 products 表中</div></div><div>另一个列（vend_name）在vendors表中</div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">FROM子句中</font></b></div><div>分别联结了vendors表和products表</div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">WHERE子句中</font></b></div><div>正确联结vendors表和products表</div><div>指示MySQL匹配vendors表中的vend_id和products表中的vend_id</div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">完全限定列名</font></b></div><div>要匹配的两个列以 vendors.vend_id 和 products.vend_id指定</div><div><br /></div>"	SQL必知必会
表联结 笛卡儿积	"笛卡儿积（cartesian product）<div><div><div>由没有联结条件的表关系返回的结果为笛卡儿积</div></div><div><div>检索出的行的数目将是第一个表中的行数乘以第二个表中的行数。</div></div><div><img src=""paste-370806001500161.jpg"" /></div></div>"	SQL必知必会
"用INNER JOIN语法创建联结<div><div><br /></div><div>查找vend_name、prod_name、prod_price</div><div><br /></div><div>products 表</div><div><img src=""paste-379563439816705.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div>vendors 表</div><div><img src=""paste-380164735238145.jpg"" /></div></div>"	"一、ANSI SQL规范首选INNER JOIN语法<div>二、尽管使用WHERE子句定义联结的确比较简单，但是使用明确的联结语法能够确保不会忘记联结条件</div><div>三、有时候这样做也能影响性能</div><div><img src=""paste-376058746503169.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div>"	SQL必知必会
"联结多个表,<div>查找订单20005中的物品，</div><div>包括prod_name、vend_name、prod_price、quantity<div><br /></div><div>products 表</div><div><img src=""paste-379563439816705.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div>vendors 表</div><div><img src=""paste-380164735238145.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div>orderitems 表</div><div><img src=""paste-379864087527425.jpg"" /></div></div>"	"一、SQL对一条SELECT语句中可以联结的表的数目没有限制<div><div>二、创建联结的基本规则也相同</div></div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;首先列出所有表，然后定义表之间的关系</div><div><br /></div><div><img src=""paste-377184027934721.jpg"" /></div><div>SELECT语句中</div><div>prond_name、prod_price 在&nbsp;products表中</div><div>vend_name 在vendors表中</div><div>quantity 在orderitems表中</div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">FROM子句中</font></b></div><div>分别联结了orderitems表、products表和vendors表</div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">WHERE子句中</font></b></div><div>定义了两个联结条件</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; 匹配<font color=""#ff5500"">products表</font>中的<font color=""#ff5500"">vend_id</font>和<font color=""#ff05de"">vendors表</font>中的<font color=""#ff05de"">vend_id</font></div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; 匹配<font color=""#ff5500"">orderitems表</font>中的<font color=""#ff5500"">prod_id</font>和<font color=""#ff05de"">products表</font>中的<font color=""#ff05de"">prod_id</font></div><div>第三了联结条件用来过滤出订单20005中的物品</div><div><br /></div>"	SQL必知必会
WEHRE子句对建立联结的重要性	<div>一、在一条SELECT语句中联结几个表时，相应的关系是在运行中构造的</div><div>二、在数据库表的定义中不存在能指示MySQL如何对表进行联结的东西</div><div>三、联结两个表时，你实际上做的是将第一个表中的每一行与第二个表中的每一行配对</div><div>四、WHERE子句作为过滤条件，它只包含那些匹配给定条件（这里是联结条件）的行，确保了逻辑上的配对，避免了迪卡尔积</div>	SQL必知必会
创建高级联结之使用表别名	"<div><img src=""paste-390769009491969.jpg"" /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">分析：</font></b></div><div><b>一、</b>可以看到，FROM子句中3个表全都具有别名。</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;customers AS c建立c作为customers的别名，等等。</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;这使得能使用省写的c而不是全名customers。</div><div><b>二、</b>在此例子中，表别名只用于WHERE子句。但是，表别名不仅能用于WHERE子句，它还可以用于SELECT的列表、ORDER BY子句以及语句的其他部分。</div><div><div><b>三、</b>应该注意，表别名只在查询执行中使用。与列别名不一样，表别名不返回到客户机。</div></div>"	SQL必知必会
"<div>使用子查询</div>你发现某物品（其ID为DTNTR）存在问题，因此想知道生产该物品的供应商生产的其他物品（prod_id，prod_name）是否也存在这些问题<div><br /></div><div>products 表<br /><div><img src=""paste-391662362689537.jpg"" /></div></div><div><br /></div>"	"<img src=""paste-391761146937345.jpg"" /><div>用WHERE子句进行子查询，返回生产ID为DTNTR的物品供应商的vend_id</div><div>WHERE子句用供应商id查出该供应商的物品</div>"	SQL必知必会
"<div>使用自联结 如何查询一个表？</div>你发现某物品（其ID为DTNTR）存在问题，因此想知道生产该物品的供应商生产的其他物品（prod_id，prod_name）是否也存在这些问题<div><br /></div><div>products 表<br /><div><img src=""paste-391662362689537.jpg"" /></div></div><div><br /></div>"	"自联结，用 AS 表别名<div>有时候处理联结远比处理子查询快得多<br /><div><img src=""paste-392323787653121.jpg"" /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">分析</font></b></div><div>一、此查询中需要的两个表实际上是相同的表，products表</div><div>二、因此products表在 FROM子句中出现了两次（虽然行为合法）</div><div>三、MySQL不知道你引用的是products表中的哪个实例</div><div>四、自联结使用表别名可以避免MySQL对products 的引用的二义性</div></div>"	SQL必知必会
组合查询	"MySQL也允许执行多个查询（多条SELECT语句）<div>并将结果作为单个查询结果集返回</div><div>这些组合查询通常称为并（union）或复合查询 （compound query）</div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">需要使用组合查询的情况</font></b></div><div> 在单个查询中从不同的表返回类似结构的数据；</div><div> 对单个表执行多个查询，按单个查询返回数据。</div>"	SQL必知必会
"组合查询之使用UNION<div><br /><div>查询价格不高于5的所有物品(vend_id，prod_id，prod_price)</div><div><span style=""color: rgb(255, 85, 0)""><b>or</b></span></div><div>找出供应商1001和1002生产的所有物品（同上）</div><div><br /></div><div>products表<br /><div><img src=""paste-397396144029697.jpg"" /></div></div></div>"	"在各条语句之间放上关键字UNION<div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">单条SELECT语句1</font></b></div><div><img src=""paste-397116971155457.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">单条SELECT语句2</font></b></div><div><img src=""paste-397155625861121.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">用UNION组合SELECT查询</font></b></div><div><img src=""paste-397275884945409.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div>两条SELECT语句用UNION关键字分隔</div><div>UNION指示MySQL执行两条SELECT语句</div><div>并把输出组 合成单个查询结果集</div><div><br /></div>"	SQL必知必会
"组合查询之用多条WHERE语句<div><br /><div>查询价格不高于5的所有物品(vend_id，prod_id，prod_price)</div><div><span style=""color: rgb(255, 85, 0)""><b>or</b></span></div><div>找出供应商1001和1002生产的所有物品（同上）</div><div><br /></div><div>products表<br /><div><img src=""paste-397396144029697.jpg"" /></div></div></div>"	"<img src=""paste-397864295464961.jpg"" />"	SQL必知必会
UNION规则	"<b><font color=""#ff5500""></font></b> UNION必须由两条或两条以上的SELECT语句组成<div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;语句之间用关 键字UNION分隔<div><b><font color=""#ff5500""></font></b>&nbsp;UNION中的每个查询必须包含相同的列、表达式或聚集函数</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;各个列不需要以相同的次序列出&nbsp;</div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500""></font> </b>列数据类型必须兼容：类型不必完全相同，但必须是DBMS可以 隐含地转换的类型</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;例如，不同的数值类型或不同的日期类型</div></div>"	SQL必知必会
组合查询使用UNION &nbsp; 包含或取消重复的行	"<div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">取消重复的行</font></b></div><div>一条SELECT语句返回4行，另一条SELECT语句返回5行</div><div>用UNION组合查询，如果存在一行重复，则只返回8行</div>UNION从查询结果集中自动去除了重复的行，这是UNION的默认行为。<div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">包含重复的行</font></b></div><div>用UNION ALL而不是UNION</div>"	SQL必知必会
UNION与WHERE的区别	UNION几乎总是完成与多个 WHERE条件相同的工作<div>如果确实需要每个条件的匹配行全部出现（包括重复行） ，则必须使用UNION ALL而不是WHERE</div>	SQL必知必会
对组合查询结果排序<div>按vend_id &nbsp;prod_price 排序</div>	"SELECT语句的输出用ORDER BY子句排序<div>在用UNION组合查询时，只 能使用一条ORDER BY子句</div><div>必须出现在最后一条SELECT语句之后</div><div><img src=""paste-430914068807681.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会
启用全文本搜索支持	"<div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">FULLTEXT(column_name)</font></b></div>一般在创建表时启用全文本搜索。<div>CREATE TABLE语句接受FULLTEXT子句，它给出被索引列的一个逗号分隔的列表</div><div>两个最常使用的引擎为MyISAM和InnoDB， 前者支持全文本搜索，而后者不支持</div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">创建支持全文本搜索的productnotes表</font></b></div><div><img src=""paste-431450939719681.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">productnotes表</font></b></div><div><img src=""paste-431463824621569.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">note_id为101的note_text</font></b></div><div><img src=""paste-239109419302913.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div>"	SQL必知必会
进行全文本搜索&nbsp;<div>搜索productnotes表note_text列中包含'rabbit'的内容的行</div>	"一、在索引之后<div>二、使用Match()函数和Against()函数执行全文本搜索</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Match()指定被搜索的列</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Against()指定要使用的搜索表达式<font color=""#ff5500"">（不分大小写，除非使用BINARY方式）</font></div><div>三、全文本搜索在每一行内部都有一个等级值(rank)，根据行中词的数目、唯一词的数目、整个索引中词的 总数以及包含该词的行的数目</div><div>四、全文本搜索比LIKE子句多了rank，并且速度快，因为数据是索引的</div><div><img src=""paste-432086594879489.jpg"" /></div><div><img src=""paste-432108069715969.jpg"" /></div><div>有两行包含词rabbit，这两个行被返回</div>"	SQL必知必会
"进行全文本搜索 <font color=""#ff5500"">用LIKE子句</font><div>搜索productnotes表note_text列中包含'rabbit'的内容的行</div>"	"<img src=""paste-432421602328577.jpg"" />"	SQL必知必会
使用查询扩展<div>查询productnotes表note_text列关于'anvils'的注释</div>	"<div>Against('***' <font color=""#ff0000""><b>WITH QUERY EXPANSION</b></font>)</div><div>查询扩展根据没有扩展的返回行每个词作了rank</div><div>再用每个词查询，多个词的rank高</div><div>查询扩展极大地增加了返回的行数</div><div style=""color: rgb(255, 85, 0); font-weight: bold; ""><b><font color=""#ff5500""><br /></font></b></div><b style=""color: rgb(255, 85, 0); "">没有查询扩展</b><div><img src=""paste-438520455888897.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">有查询扩展</font></b></div><div><img src=""paste-438589175365633.jpg"" /></div><div><img src=""paste-438602060267521.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div>"	SQL必知必会
布尔文本搜索之不指定布尔操作符	"<div>Against('heavy' <font color=""#ff0000"">IN BOOLEAN MODE</font>)</div><div>不指定布尔操作符，等同没用布尔文本搜索&nbsp;</div><div><br /></div><div><div><img src=""paste-439993629671425.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div></div>"	SQL必知必会
布尔文本搜索<div>查询 productnotes表 note_text列<br /><div>匹配包含heavy但不包含任意以rope开始的词的行</div></div>	"<div>Against('heavy -rope*' IN BOOLEAN MODE)</div><div>匹配 heavy</div><div>-rope* 排除包含rope*（任何以rope开始的词，包括 ropes）的行</div><img src=""paste-440199788101633.jpg"" />"	SQL必知必会
布尔文本搜索<div>查询 productnotes表 note_text列</div><div>匹配同时包含词rabbit和bait的行</div>	"<img src=""paste-442407401291777.jpg"" />"	SQL必知必会
布尔文本搜索<div>查询 productnotes表 note_text列</div><div>匹配包含rabbit和bait中的至少一 个词的行</div>	"<img src=""paste-443352294096897.jpg"" />"	SQL必知必会
布尔文本搜索<div>查询 productnotes表 note_text列</div><div>匹配短语rabbit bait</div>	"<img src=""paste-444224172457985.jpg"" />"	SQL必知必会
布尔文本搜索<div>查询 productnotes表 note_text列</div><div>匹配rabbit和carrot，增加前者的等级，降低后者的等级</div>	"<img src=""paste-444305776836609.jpg"" />"	SQL必知必会
布尔文本搜索<div>查询 productnotes表 note_text列</div><div>同时匹配词safe和combination，降低后者的等级</div>	"<img src=""paste-445362338791425.jpg"" />"	SQL必知必会
布尔文本搜索的常用操作符	"<img src=""paste-446071008395265.jpg"" />"	SQL必知必会
插入完整的行<div>插入下面数据到customers表中</div><div>(cust_name：Pep E. LaPew，</div><div>cust_address：100 Main Street，</div><div>cust_city：Los Angeles，</div><div>cust_state：CA，</div><div>cust_aip：90046，</div><div>cust_country：USA)</div>	"<img src=""paste-447411038191617.jpg"" /><div>没有给出的值采用默认值，默认值可自定，或NULL</div><div>表名后的列名可以不给出来</div><div>此时插入的数据要按表中列的顺序，没有的值要给出NULL（如主键）</div><div>但这是一种不安全的做法</div>"	SQL必知必会
插入多个行	"可以使用多条INSERT语句，甚至一次提交它们，每条语句用一个分号结 束<div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">单条INSERT语名插入多行</font></b></div><div>1、列名和值的次序要相同</div><div>2、每组值用一对圆括号括起来， 用逗号分隔</div><div>可以提高数据库处理的性能</div><div><img src=""paste-448141182631937.jpg"" /></div><div><img src=""paste-448175542370305.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div><div><br /></div>"	SQL必知必会
插入检索出的数据<div>将custnew表中将所有数据导入导入到 customers表中</div>	"NSERT SELECT<div>将一条SELECT语句的结果插入表中<br /><div>是由一条INSERT语句和一条SELECT 语句组成的</div></div><div><br /></div><div>使用INSERT SELECT从custnew中将所有数据导入 customers。</div><div><img src=""paste-448536319623169.jpg"" /></div><div><img src=""paste-448549204525057.jpg"" /></div><div><br /></div>"	SQL必知必会
更新数据 单个列<div>更新customers表中cust_id为10005的cust_email</div><div>email:elmer@fudd.com</div>	"<img src=""paste-472450697527297.jpg"" /><div>UPDATE语句总是以要更新的表的名字开始</div><div>UPDATE语句以WHERE子句结束</div>"	SQL必知必会
更新数据 多个列<div>更新customers表中cust_id为10005的cust_email和cust_name</div><div>email:elmer@fudd.com</div><div>name:The Fudds</div>	"<img src=""paste-472605316349953.jpg"" />"	SQL必知必会
更新多行时出现错误，忽略错误	<div>IGNORE关键字</div><div>更新出现错误，则整个UPDATE操作被取消</div><div><br /></div><div>即使是发生错误，也继续进行更新</div><div>UPDATE IGNORE customers...</div>	SQL必知必会
用更新数据的形式<div>删除customers表 cust_email列的值</div>	"为了删除某个列的值，可设置它为NULL（假如表定义允许NULL值）<div><img src=""paste-475671922999297.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会
删除customers表的cust_email整个列的值	"<div>DELETE删除整行而不是删除列</div><div>用UPDATA要注意用过滤（WHERE 或 HAVING）,否则会改变整个列的值</div><div><br /></div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">UPDATE FROM customers</font></b><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">SET cust_email = NULL</font></b></div>"	SQL必知必会
删除一行<div>从customers表中删除cust_id为10006的值</div>	"DELETE删除整行而不是删除列<div>DELETE不删除表本身<br /><div><img src=""paste-476801499398145.jpg"" /></div></div>"	SQL必知必会
使用UPDATE或DELETE时要遵循的习惯	一、一定要带上WHERE 子句，除非想更新和删除每一行<div>二、保证每个表都有主键</div><div>三、使用WHERE子句前，先用SELECT进行测试，防编写的WHERE子句不正确，删错了</div><div>四、使用强制实施引用完整性的数据库（联结表），这样MySQL将不允许删除具有与其他表相关联的数据的行</div>	SQL必知必会
创建表&nbsp;	"利用CREATE TABLE创建表<div>表名紧跟在CREATE TABLE关键字后面</div><div>表定义（所有列）括在圆括号之中</div><div>各列之间用逗号分隔</div><div>每列的格式：列名 + 类型<br /><div><img src=""paste-479369889841153.jpg"" /></div></div>"	SQL必知必会
创建表 NOT NULL值	NOT NULL &nbsp;不允许NULL值的列不接受该列没有值的行<div>在创建时由表的定义规定<br /><div>在插入或更新行时，该列必须有值,否则返回错误，且插入失败</div></div>	SQL必知必会
使用 AUTO_INCREMENT	AUTO_INCREMENT告诉MySQL，本列每当增加一行时自动增量<div>执行一个INSERT操作时，MySQL自动对该列增量</div><div>每个表只允许一个AUTO_INCREMENT列，而且它必须被索引。可用作主键属性</div>	SQL必知必会
查看最后一个AUTO_INCREMENT值	"<b><font color=""#ff5500"">SELECT last_insert_id()</font></b><div>此语句返回最后一个AUTO_INCREMENT值，然后可以将它用于后续的MySQL语句</div>"	SQL必知必会
创建表 指定默认值	"<div>默认值用CREATE TABLE语句的列定义中的DEFAULT关键字指定</div>MySQL不允许使用函 数作为默认值，它只支持常量<div><br /><div><img src=""paste-484034224324609.jpg"" /></div><div><img src=""paste-484047109226497.jpg"" /></div><div>quantity列包含订单中每项物品的数 量。</div><div>在此例子中，给该列的描述添加文本DEFAULT 1指示MySQL在未给出数量的情况下使用数量1。&nbsp;</div></div>"	SQL必知必会
表的引擎类型	"如果省略ENGINE=语句，则使用默认引擎（很可能是MyISAM） ，多数SQL语句都会默认使用<div><br /></div><div><b><font color=""#ff5500"">三种常见引擎</font></b><br /><div>MyISAM</div><div>一个性能极高的引擎， 它支持全文本搜索 （参见第18章），但不支持事务处理。&nbsp;<br /><div>InnoDB</div><div>一个可靠的事务处理引擎&nbsp;（参见第26章），它不支持全文本搜索</div></div><div>MEMORY</div><div>MEMORY在功能等同于MyISAM，但由于数据存储在内存（不是磁盘） 中，速度很快（特别适合于临时表）</div></div>"	SQL必知必会
更新表<div>给vendors表添加一个vend_phone列</div>	"<img src=""paste-484815908372481.jpg"" />"	SQL必知必会
更新表<div>删vendors表的vend_phone列</div>	"<img src=""paste-484914692620289.jpg"" />"	SQL必知必会
用ALTER TABLE定义外键<div>orders表的cust_id</div><div>联结</div><div>customers表的cust_id</div>	"<img src=""paste-485735031373825.jpg"" /><div><br /></div><div>ADD CONSTRAINT &nbsp; 增加约束</div><div>fk_orders_customers 是orders表中的外键名</div>"	SQL必知必会
删除表<div>删除customers2表</div>	"ROP TABLE语句<div><img src=""paste-486392161370113.jpg"" /></div>"	SQL必知必会

component	this allows to reuse a DOM element in a form of templetate	
filter	Key name which allows to filter out values in pipe(s)	
v-bind	Key word used to bind a variable where it is defined in data property.	
Short hand for v-bind	:	
key word used to get contents between opening and closing tag name of a component.	slots	
vue.use()	After import, this command is used for the rest of the program to recognize the&nbsp; imported variable.&nbsp;	
props	Used in component, need to declare this in order to receive variables from parents	vue.js
mounted	a hook at the end&nbsp; of Vue cycle	
inject	keyword used by parent to send variables to children.	
Fromm vee-validate plugins, returns a boolean value whether or not it has an error	errors.has('name')	
"Key word used to list all requirements e.g. v-validate="" 'required' """	v-validate

if condition usually used to show or not show a certain DOM.	v-if	
v-else-if	else if in Vue	
Injects dependency injection to its children regardless how nested its children are.	provide(){return {formdata: this.formdata}}	
import	It is like include in C/C++	
From web console, what do you type in order to see what values are sent to component.	this.$children	
API call to validate one specific field. The validation criteria has to be defined in this particular field.	validate(this.name)	
name of class that makes things centered, appropriate padding, appropriate boundaries.	"class=""container"""	
Name of class which creats a row.	"class=""row"""	
"class=""col-md-6 col-md-offset-3"""	Define a partition of 6 columns but has 3 columns empty.	
"class=""text-center"""	Makes all texts centered	
Inserts appropriate spacing for an input field in a form. Usually used in an input element tag.	"class=""form-control"""	
class for a submit button	"class=""btn btn-primary btn-block"""	
Enables double binding of a variable.	v-model	
el	Keyword which will associate to DOM&nbsp; &nbsp;initiate Vue.js coverage.	
Name of a property of Vue object which defines functions and monitors the dynamic of variables and triggers the function when the variable inside the function has reached criteria.	watch	
.length&nbsp;	has the length of a variable.

localStorage	Built in storage to store variables in browsers	
localStorage.getItem('variableName')	How to retrieve a variable from localStorage?	
var bookMarks = [];	How to declare an array?	
How to add an item to an array?	bookmarks.push(bookmark);	
How to create an object?	var objName = { name1:value1, name2:value2};	
How to convert an object to a JSON string? (serialized JSON)	JSON.stringfy(bookmark);	
How to convert stringfied JSON variable from local storage to Javascript object?	var bookmarks = JSON.parse(localStorate.getItem('bookmarks'));	
How to delete an item from an array?	bookmarks.splice(i,1);	
How to set a content to a SPAN tag with ID = bookmarksResults?	bookamrksResults.innerHTML = '&lt;div&gt; ... &lt;/div&gt;';	
How to create a regular expression object?	var&nbsp; expression = /.*p.*o.*b/;&nbsp; var regex = new RegExp(expression);	
Given a string Str and a RegExp object regEx, how to validate if this string has the regEx pattern?	Str.match(regEx)	
Given a regular expression /.*P.*O/, how to test if a string Str has this pattern without using Regular Expression object?	/.*P.*O/.test(Str)	
command used to make CSS available for certain width?	@media (min-width: 768px) { css definition&nbsp; }	
How to get the value of input text field when the key event is 'keyup' on text input ID name of 'searchUser'?	$('#searchUser').on('keyup', function(e){ let userName = e.target.value; }	
what is the syntax of calling a URL with data using ajax?	$.ajax({url:' https://... ', data:{ property1: '...', property2: ' ... ' } )	
Lets say ajax call was made.&nbsp; What is the chain function to receive the respone?	.done(function(response){ ..... } );	
Let say ajax .done(function(repos)) returns an array of repo.&nbsp; How would you iteratate each repo?	.done(function(repos){ $.each(repos, function(index, repo){&nbsp; }	
Lets say you want to append html tags to ID 'repos', what is the syntax for this?	$('#repos').append(`&lt;div&gt; ..... &lt;div&gt;`);&nbsp; Note back tick.&nbsp;	
Given an element ID of 'profile', how to replace the content?	$('#profile').html(`&nbsp; &nbsp; `);	
Lets say variable repo is passed in.&nbsp; There is a property name name.&nbsp; You need to display the value in span tag.&nbsp; How would you do it?	&lt;span&gt;${repo.name}&lt;/span&gt;	
How would you display href value where the variable is 'data.address'?	"&lt;a href=""${data.address}""&gt;&lt;/a&gt;"	
class name whic adds appropriate space to ul or ol bootstrap way?	"class=""list-group"""	
class name which adds appropriate space to each list item?	"class=""list-group-item"""	
4 badge names that can be used with span tag?	badge badge-dark,&nbsp; badge badge-primary, badge badge-success, badge badge-info	
what is tag used to input an avatar image?	"&lt;img class=""img-thumbnail avatar"" src=""...""&gt;"	
How to make a hyperlink to open in a new tab?	"taget=""_blank"""	
Inline style declaration use font aria for this div. How would you do it?	"&lt;div&nbsp; style=""font:arial""&gt; ....&nbsp; &lt;/div&gt;"	
Lets suppose there are 4 columns to an article. How to setup such that this article is very responsive?	"class=""col-lg-3 col-md-3 col-sm-6 col-xs-12"""	
How to resolve the ill effect scenario where columns are not evenly leveled? This occurs where width size is in small mode.	"&lt;div class=""clearfix visible-sm""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;"	
In a table setting, how to make a tr to occupy all 4 table columns?	"&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td colspan=""4""&gt;Best Baseball Player&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;"	
what is tag name for table head?	&lt;thead&gt;	
Can you use &lt;th&gt; tag within &lt;tbody&gt;?	"Yes.&nbsp; &lt;tbody&gt;&lt;th class=""col-md-2""&gt;&lt;/th&gt;&lt;th class=""text-center""&gt;Average&lt;/th&gt;&lt;/tbody&gt;"	
How to create an empty column?	"&lt;tbody&gt;&lt;th class=""col md-2""&gt;&lt;/th&gt; ..."	
Create div setting where first 6 columns is left empty and table is shifted to right at large display setting? But when display is in small display mode, the table fits in?	"&lt;div class=""col-md-6""&gt;&lt;/div&gt;<div>&lt;div class=""col-md-6 col-md-offset-6""&gt;&nbsp; ... &lt;/div&gt;</div>"	
How make table to stripe?	"&lt;table class=""table-striped""&gt;"	
How to make table bordered?	"class=""table-bordered"""	
How to make table highlight when mouse move to a row?	"class=""table-hover"""	
How to make a well hide when in small, md or large mode?	"&lt;div class=""well hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg""&gt; ....&nbsp; &lt;/div&gt;"	
How to make a well hide mid or large mode?	"class=""well hidden-md hidden-lg"""	
How to make a well hide in sm mode?	"class=""well hidden-sm"""	
How to print '&gt;'?	&lt;p&gt;&amp;gt;&lt;/p&gt;	
What dimension is consider xlarge?	width &gt; 1200px	
what dimension is considered large?	992 ... 1200px	
what dimension is considered md?	768 ... 992 px	
what dimension is considered sm?	&lt; 768 px	
What make button color to be blue?	"&lt;button input=""submit"" class=""btn btn-primary""&gt;&lt;/button&gt;"	
What make button color to be green?	"&lt;button type=""submit"" class=""btn btn-success""&gt;&lt;/button&gt;"	
What makes button color to be orange?	"&lt;button type=""submit"" class=""btn btn-warning""&gt;&lt;/button&gt;"	
What makes button color to be red?	"&lt;button type=""submit"" class=""btn btn-danger""&gt;&lt;/button&gt;"	
How to make button size to be smallest?	"class=""btn-sm"""	
How to make button size to be large?	"class=""btn-lg"""	
How to make button size to be extra small?	"class=""btn-xs"""	
"&lt;input type=""button"" class=""btn btn-info"" value=""Info""&gt;"	How to create a button using input tag with labeled Info?	
How to use anchor tag and display a button?	"&lt;a href="""" class=""btn btn-primary btn-lg"" role=""button""&gt;More Info&lt;/a&gt;"	
How to disable a button?	"disabled=""disabled"""	
How to create a button which displays like a link?	"&lt;button type=""submit"" class=""btn btn-primary btn-link""&gt;Link&lt;/button&gt;"	
How to create a group of buttons?	"&lt;div class=""btn-group"" role=""group""&gt; ... &lt;/div&gt;"	
How to displan a glyphicon with span tag?	"&lt;span class=""glyphicon glyphicon-film""&gt;&lt;/span&gt;"	
How to embed a glyphicon inside anchor tag?	"&lt;a href="""" class=""btn btn-primary btn-lg""&gt;Trash&lt;span class=""glyphicon glyphicon-phone-alt"" aria-hidden=""true""&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;"	
How to embed phone icon inside a button?	"&lt;button type=""button"" class=""btn btn-primary btn-lg""&gt;&lt;span class=""glyphicon glyphicon-phone-alt"" area-hidden=""true""&gt;&lt;/span&gt;Call Me &lt;/button&gt;"	
Content based filtering	Recommend based on content of movies.	
Collaborative filtering	Recommend based on other users (e.g. moviegoers)	
Hybrid filtering	Recommend based on content based and collaborative based.	
sudo conda update pandas	Command used to upgrade pandas version	
Find the python and anaconda version	python --version	
print (pd.__version__)	get the current panda version from code.	
upgrade python using anaconda	sudo conda update python	
conda list	Get the list of all packages in anaconda	
NaT	Not a time	
Suppose m represents month.&nbsp; How to obtain next month?	m+1	
flag to indicate the period is daily	freq='D'	
flag to indicate period is hourly	freq='H'	
property name for start time of a period	pd.start_time	
property name for end time of a period	pd.end_time	
Write h+1 with pandas command where h is hour.	h + pd.offsets.Hour(1)	
q1= pd.Period('2017Q1', freq='Q-JAN'). What is the last day of the fiscal year?	2017-1-31	
q1= pd.Period('2017Q1', freq='Q-JAN'). What is q1.start_time?	2016-02-01	
q1= pd.Period('2017Q1', freq='Q-JAN'). What is q1.end_time?	2017-04-30	
q1.asfreq('M',how='start')	q1= pd.Period('2017Q1', freq='Q-JAN'). How to obtain start month of fiscal year?&nbsp;	
q1= pd.Period('2017Q1', freq='Q-JAN'). How to obtain endinng month?	q1.asfreq('M', how='end')	
Covers a period of week (Sun-Sat) which contains 2017-07-05.	w = pd.Period('2017-07-05',freq='W'). What is w?	
Lets say w2, w1 represents 2 week periods. What is w2-w1?	Number of weeks between these 2 dates.	
pd.period_range('2011', '2017', freq='q-jan')	<strong>Walmart's fiscal year ends in Jan, below is how you generate walmart's fiscal quarters between 2011 and 2017. How to create quarterly periods?</strong>	
is Q1 timestamp or time period?	time period	
read_csv()	method name to read csv file	
"df[""Start Date""]=df.index.map(lambda x: x.start_time)"	Given df, add a new dataframe column call 'Start Date' which assign a value of start_time of Quarter which is 4 Quarters in the past?&nbsp;	
"df[""End Date""]=df.index.map(lambda x: x.end_time)"	Given df, assign a new column call 'End Date' which is the end_time of every fiscal quarter which is&nbsp; Quarter of a year ago.	
"df = pd.read_csv(""msft.csv"", header=1,index_col='Date Time',parse_dates=True)"	Read csv file. Ignore top header. Convert 'Date Time' to date object and use it as index.	
<div><div><div><div>df.index </div></div></div></div><div><div><div><br></div></div></div>	print out the index of df.	
2 types of datetimes	naive(no datetime awareness) and timezone awareness.&nbsp; dtype property displays timezone.	
df.index.tz_localize(tz='US/Eastern')	Assign timezone to 'US/Eastern'	
df.tz_convert('Europe/Berlin')	Convert local time to 'Europe/Berlin'	
2017-08-17 15:00:00+02:00, what is +02:00?	2 hours ahead of Greenwitch Time.	
from pytz import all_timezones<div>print (all_timezones)<br></div>	How to get all timezones around the world?	
london = pd.date_range('3/6/2012 00:09:00', periods=10, freq='H',tz='Europe/London')	Crea<div>te time range starting 3/6/2012 00:09.<div>For next 10 periods.</div><div>Freq is hourly.</div></div><div>Time zone is 'Europe/London'</div>	
"rng = pd.date_range(start=""2017-08-22 09:00:00"",periods=10, freq='30min')<br>s = pd.Series(range(10),index=rng)"	Create a date range starting 2017-08-22 09:00. For next 10 periods.&nbsp; Interval of 30 minutes.&nbsp; Create a series with this description.	
"b = s.tz_localize(tz=""Europe/Berlin"")&nbsp;"	"Given time series s, change the time zone to ""Europe/Berlin""."	
"pd.read_csv(""fb.csv"",parse_dates=['Date'],index_col='Date')"	read csv file. Change 'Date' column from string date to object date. Make it into index.	
df.shift(1)	How to shift rows of data one down?	
df['Prev Day Price'] = df['Price'].shift(1)	create a new column called 'Prev Day Price' and set the data.(date is in ascending order)	
Difference between array and list	list uses []. array needs keyword n = array(3,6,9).&nbsp; with array, it can perform group operation like n/3. but list, it cannot.

access tom's tele number?	telephone['tom']	
delete tom's number	del telephone['tom']	
delete all keys of telephone dictionary	telephone.clear()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt	header declaration	
%matplotlib inline	declaration to be used in jupyter notebook	
Summarize information on 'Data' tab&nbsp;	It has information on individual invoice(invoice #, invoice date, order #, order_date). Customer(name, id, custID-name) Product(id, item_desc, group_id,group_desc), sales_rep(last_name, first_name), Broad(Broad Group, Broad Name)	
In the 'Data' tab, 'Broad xyz' columns,&nbsp; how are the data from these columns are derived?	Reference file lookup against 'Broad_xover' tab.&nbsp; Compares the value from product_group_id against the 'Broad_xover'.	
On the 'Data' tab, which view is used to populate these data?&nbsp;&nbsp;	p21_sales_history_view	
In the 'data' tab, data is populated from p21_sales_history_view and p21_view_customer views.&nbsp; How can you find it out from Excel.	1)Click Data menu. (2)Click 'Queries &amp; Connections (3)A window is created on the lower right corner. (4)RIght click and choose 'Properties'. (5)A window pops up. (6)Click Definition tab. (7)Under Command text, there is SQL query.	
&nbsp;What kind of information is stored in 'Profiles' tab?	This is a lookup table which maps class_id to broad categories like (plumbing, truck,hose fitting ...)	
In 'Profiles' tab, how many class_id exist?	46	
In Profile tab, how many different broad categories can class_id can be grouped?&nbsp;	16	
What are 4 tab names in the P21_sales_history_view spreadsheet?	Pivot, Data, Profile and&nbsp; &nbsp;Broad_XOver	
What is the name of the tool in order to query SQL server?	Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio&nbsp;	
What is the name of the database(not the production)?	P21PLAY	
What is the password to access play database?	M1dland	
What is the User ID for play database?	P21Playodbc	
What is the IP address of Play Database server?	192.168.101.8	
How many groups out of 16 broad groups of clients make up 80% of sales?	4	
4 out of 16 broad groups make up 80% of sales. who are they?	Fluid Power,&nbsp;	
What are 2 ways to identify virtual sales customer opportunity?	(1)Lets say the broad group did 30% of sales in 28-PIPE FITTINGS. Generally speaking,&nbsp; we are expecting each client to do around 30% for 28-PIPE FITTINGS. Currently, Charlie has criteria of less than 10% as the cutoff for identifying potential customer. In this case, if a client does less than 3% of sales in this category, we identify it as a potential to improve sales for this customer. Not sure, this is a correct analogy. We want these customers to be less 2 std deviation from the median.&nbsp; Look at the normal distribution. This is similar to movie goers. If a movie goer A likes comedy and a movie goer X also likes comedy, recommend what movie goer X watched to movie goer A and vice versa. (2)This method wasn't explored yet.&nbsp; But we want to identify those clients who have broken the pattern of buying.&nbsp; e.g. Those who used to buy 28-PIPE FITTINGS, BRASS all of sudden stop buying.	
What is the actual virtual sales pitch will be made and how?	Virtual system will identify opportunities for clients.&nbsp; When a client logs in, virtual sales system is ready to customize a sales pitch for this particular client.	
Around how many invoice transactions exist for 2018?	650000	
&nbsp;what are 5 ways to analyze data according to 'Pivot' tab?	(1)customer ID (2)Client Profile(around 16)&nbsp; (3)Client ID(around 46)&nbsp; (4)Product broad categories&nbsp; (5)Invoice data	
What is the username and password to data dictionary?	Username:documentation&nbsp; &nbsp; PW:Epicor!2018	
In the 'Pivot' tab, how is the precedence of autosort?	(1)sorts vertically by total by the sales by individual client (2)sorts horizontally by total sales by product group.

font-size: 15px; vertical-align: baseline; clear: both; color: rgb(36, 39, 41);"">Here,&nbsp;<code style=""margin: 0px; padding: 1px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: inherit; font-family: Consolas, Menlo, Monaco, &quot;Lucida Console&quot;, &quot;Liberation Mono&quot;, &quot;DejaVu Sans Mono&quot;, &quot;Bitstream Vera Sans Mono&quot;, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(239, 240, 241); white-space: pre-wrap;"">\U</code>&nbsp;starts an eight-character Unicode escape, such as '\U00014321`. In your code, the escape is followed by the character 's', which is invalid.</p><p style=""margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: inherit; font-family: Arial, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; vertical-align: baseline; clear: both; color: rgb(36, 39, 41);"">You either need to duplicate all backslashes, or prefix the string with&nbsp;<code style=""margin: 0px; padding: 1px 5px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: inherit; font-family: Consolas, Menlo, Monaco, &quot;Lucida Console&quot;, &quot;Liberation Mono&quot;, &quot;DejaVu Sans Mono&quot;, &quot;Bitstream Vera Sans Mono&quot;, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(239, 240, 241); white-space: pre-wrap;"">r</code>&nbsp;(to produce a raw string).</p>"	
"<pre style=""margin-bottom: 1em; padding: 5px; border: 0px; font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: inherit; font-family: Consolas, Menlo, Monaco, &quot;Lucida Console&quot;, &quot;Liberation Mono&quot;, &quot;DejaVu Sans Mono&quot;, &quot;Bitstream Vera Sans Mono&quot;, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; vertical-align: baseline; width: auto; max-height: 600px; background-color: rgb(239, 240, 241); overflow-wrap: normal; color: rgb(36, 39, 41);""><code style=""margin: 0px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: inherit; font-family: Consolas, Menlo, Monaco, &quot;Lucida Console&quot;, &quot;Liberation Mono&quot;, &quot;DejaVu Sans Mono&quot;, &quot;Bitstream Vera Sans Mono&quot;, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(239, 240, 241); white-space: inherit;"">jupyter notebook --debug &gt; log.file 2&gt;&amp;1</code></pre>"	Capture error log to a file.&nbsp; Use notepad to see it.	
Lets say you are reading an Excel spreadsheet. Lets say there is a column called 'price' and some of its values are 'NA'.&nbsp; How to populate this data to 0 when the value is 'NA'?	"<div>create a function like this:</div><div><br></div><div>def convert_price_cell(cell):</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; if cell==""n.a."":</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return 50</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; return cell</div><div><br></div><div>There is&nbsp; keyword converters. The syntax is as follows:</div><div><br></div><div><div>df = pd.read_excel(""stock_data.xlsx"",""Sheet1"", converters= {</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 'price': convert_price_cell<br></div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; })</div></div><div><br></div>"	
"<div>df.to_excel(""new.xlsx"", sheet_name=""stocks"", index=False, startrow=2, startcol=1)</div><div><br></div>"	How to specify the starting point of write to excel spreadsheet from row=2 and col=1?	
"<div>df_stocks = pd.DataFrame({</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; 'tickers': ['GOOGL', 'WMT', 'MSFT'],</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; 'price': [845, 65, 64 ],</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; 'pe': [30.37, 14.26, 30.97],</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; 'eps': [27.82, 4.61, 2.12]</div><div>})</div><div><br></div><div>df_weather =&nbsp; pd.DataFrame({</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; 'day': ['1/1/2017','1/2/2017','1/3/2017'],</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; 'temperature': [32,35,28],</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; 'event': ['Rain', 'Sunny', 'Snow']</div><div>})</div><div><br></div><div>with pd.ExcelWriter('stocks_weather.xlsx') as writer:</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; df_stocks.to_excel(writer, sheet_name=""stocks"")</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; df_weather.to_excel(writer, sheet_name=""weather"")</div>"	Lets say there are 2 data frames.&nbsp; We want to populate 1 data frame to sheet called 'stocks' and the other data frae to sheet called 'weather'.	
How to examine the data type of each column of a dataframe called Data?	Data.dtypes	
"india_weather = pd.DataFrame({<br> ""city"": [""mumbai"",""delhi"",""banglore""],<br> ""temperature"": [32,45,30],<br> ""humidity"": [80, 60, 78]<br>})"	"create a DF where column names are ""city"", ""temperature"" and ""humidity"".&nbsp; The data are [""mumbai"", ""delhi"", ""banglore""], [32,45,30] and [80,60,78] respectively.&nbsp;"	
df = pd.concat([india_weather, us_weather])	lets say there are 2 identical dataframes. How to concatenate them?	
df = pd.concat([india_weather, us_weather], ignore_index=True)	when concatenating 2 DF, how to ignore index?	
when repeating index occurs after concatenating 2 dataframes, what is the remedy?	df = pd.concat([india_weather, us_weather], ignore_index=True)<br><div>this will eliminate repeaing index. 0,1,2,0,1,2 becomes 0,1,2,3,4,5</div>	
after concatenating 2 DF, how to put label in first column?	"df = pd.concat([india_weather, us_weather], keys=[""india"", ""us""])"	
"after concatenating 2 DF (us,india), how to display just ""us"" DF?"	"df.loc[""us""]"	
"temperature_df = pd.DataFrame({<br> ""city"": [""mumbai"",""delhi"",""banglore""],<br> ""temperature"": [32,45,30],<br>}, index=[0,1,2])"	how to specify index when defining a DF?	
It will print out index 1 first and then index 0.	How is the print out when index =[1,0] was declared?	
When concatenating 2 frames with different column names, how to conatenate them on x-axis?&nbsp;	df = pd.concat([temperature_df,winspeed_df], axis=1)&nbsp; axis=1 refers to x-axis	
is it possible to add a new column as a Series to a DF?&nbsp; If so, how?	"Yes.&nbsp; Let s = pd.Series([""Humid"", ""Dry"", ""Rain""], name=""event"")&nbsp; &nbsp;Let temperature be a DF.&nbsp; df = pd.concat([temperature, s], axis=1)&nbsp; In this case ""event"" would be a new column"	
how to find out type of a variable?	type(x)	
when reading csv file and want to convert string date to date date with 'day' column, how do you do it?	"df = pd.read_csv(""weather_data.csv"",parse_dates=['day'])"	
how to force 'day' column to be index?	df.set_index('day',inplace=True)	
new_df = df.fillna(0)	how to replace NaN with 0?	
there are 3 different ways to fill NaN per column. For 'temperature', 50. For 'windspeed', 0. For 'event', 'No Event'. How to define them?	df.fillna({'temperature':50, 'windspeed':0, 'event':'No Event'})	
fill Na with previous cell.	df.fillna(ffill).&nbsp; ffill means forward fill.	
how to fill Na from cell above?	"df.fillNa(method=""bfill"")"	
how to fill in Na values from the nearest column?	"df.fillna(method=""bfill"", axis=""columns"")"	
how to fill by interpolation?	df.interpolate()	
what is more accurate fill in than interpolation()? why?	"df.interpolate(method=""time"")"	
how do you get NaN value from numpy?	numpy.NaN	
Lets say you want to replace -99999 with NaN. How do you do it?	df.replace(-99999, value=np.NaN)	
new_df = df.replace(to_replace=[-99999,-88888], value=0)	want to replace either -99999, -88888 to 0. How do you do it?	
map replacement of -99999 -&gt; np.Nan and 'no event' -&gt; 'Sunny'	df.replace({ -999999:np.NaN, 'no event':'Sunny'})	
how to perform regex replacement? from temperature column and winspeed column, get rid of all characters.	df.replace({'temperature': '[A-Za-z]', 'windspeed':'[a-z]'}, '', regex=True)	
map 'poor'-&gt;1 'average'-&gt;2 'good'-&gt;3 'exceptional'-&gt;4	df.replace(['poor','average','good','exceptional'], [1,2,3,4])	
how to find out about a df g ?	g.describe()	
find out how many rows of data a DF carries?	g.count()	
"for city, data in g:,<br>print(""city:"",city),<br>print(""\n""),<br>print(""data:"",data)"	lets say ther are city and data columns in g dataframe, print out its values in a loop.	
How to add all columns of a DF to a new column 'e'?	df['e] = df.sum(axis=1)	
lets say you have g = DF['extended_price'][DF['profile']=='xyz'].groupby['company_name'].sum().&nbsp; &nbsp;This will create doesn't make a sense dtype of float64 but it really has 2 columns of info.&nbsp; How to create a DF and create 2 columns?	d_df = pd.DataFrame(g)&nbsp; &nbsp; d_df = d_df.reset_index()&nbsp; reset_index() creates 2 columns. the index column is called company_name.

How to convert it to an int?	
what is difference between type(x) and x.dtypes?	e.g. lets say x is DataFrame. type(x) will say it is a DataFrame where x.dtypes will print out data types of each column.	
Object to int conversion occurs with df['xyz'].astype(int). But what is the exact int type?&nbsp;&nbsp;	int32	
Object to int conversion occurs with df['xyz'].astype(int). But what if you need int64?	df['xyz'].astype(str).astype('int64') Note single quote.	
when a CSV file is read, how Panda determines the column dtype?	Panda will determine the data. If data is consistent, it will smartly come up with dtype.&nbsp; However if the column has mixed type, the type will be object.	
How to return just the data itself not metadata?	Use method called item()	
Lets say there is a nuisance row with text 'temperature' in a DF called df. How to get rid of it?	df = df.drop('temperature')	
Lets say there is an existing DF called df.&nbsp; you want to create a new df with criteria of 'amount' column &gt; 0. how?	df1 = df[df['amount']&gt;0]

padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: inherit; font-family: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: rgb(48, 51, 54);"">]]) vs. </span></code>print<span class=""pun"" style=""font-family: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; white-space: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: rgb(48, 51, 54);"">df</span><span class=""pun"" style=""font-family: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; white-space: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: rgb(48, 51, 54);"">.</span><span class=""pln"" style=""font-family: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; white-space: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: rgb(48, 51, 54);"">loc</span><span class=""pun"" style=""font-family: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; white-space: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: rgb(48, 51, 54);"">[</span><span class=""lit"" style=""font-family: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; white-space: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: rgb(125, 39, 39);"">159220</span><span class=""pun"" style=""font-family: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; white-space: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font-stretch: inherit; line-height: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: rgb(48, 51, 54);"">])</span></pre>"	first one prints actual content of the row number specified. latter one is Panda series with one dtype.	
how to specify index names to a,b,c?<div><br></div>	df.DataFrame(index=['a', 'b', 'c'])	
df.at(2, 'c') = 10	Assign 10 to 2nd row and column c of DF df.	
what is the impact of df.set_index( 'city', inplace=True) to print out of a frame?	numerical index is replaced with the 'city' column. so when print out, no more numerical indices.	
lets say two DF(df1,df2) with identical columns('temperature','humidity'). When these 2 frames are merged, how to rename the columns with _first and _second?	"df3 = pd.merge(df1,df2, on=""city"", how=""inner"", suffixes=('_first', '_second'))"	
lets say index is on date and columns [city, temperature, humidity]. Switch perspective with index on city and column on date.	df.pivot(index='city', columns='date)	
lets say, there are 2 top headers of columns[temperature, humidity]. how to display just humidity?	add values='humidity'	
lets say the index is numerical and date column has repetitious dates. any recommendation on remedying this?	df.pivot(index='date', columns='city')	
what happens to values if there are multiple values on a same date and date happens to be indexed?	The values will be averaged out.	
How to add all values instead of averaging out when pivoting a table?	df.pivot_table( ... aggfunc=np.sum)	
how to convert string date to date date?	df['date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['date'])	
(df.pivot_table(index=pd.Grouper(freq='M',key='date'),columns='city'))	Given dates as index. Want monthly breakdown. How to do it using pivot_table?	
what is df.stack()?	pivot columns to index so the data frame becomes more stacked up(vertical).	
lets say there are 2 headers. How would you stack up DF using the top most header?	df.stack(level=0)	
In df.stack(), when level is not identified, what happens?	The lowest header will be indexed.&nbsp;	
What is the easiest way to move rows to columns?	DF.unstack()	
what is wrong with this statement? DF.set_index('Profile')	Need DF = DF.set_index('Profile')	
What is y='extended_price' in DF.pie(y='extended_price')?	This is the value where the pie proportion will be based on. Without it, pie chart won't know what to calculate.	
How to size up/down the pie chart? When using df.plot.pie(), this can be plugged inside parenthesis.	figsize=(10,10)&nbsp; This can be applied to other kinds of charts.	
how to get summary of statistics of a column of DF?	df['column name'].describe()	
"<span style=""color: rgb(36, 39, 41); font-family: Consolas, Menlo, Monaco, &quot;Lucida Console&quot;, &quot;Liberation Mono&quot;, &quot;DejaVu Sans Mono&quot;, &quot;Bitstream Vera Sans Mono&quot;, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; background-color: rgb(239, 240, 241);"">plt.figure(figsize=(20,10))</span>"	how to configure size of a chart?

what is top 4 profiles which generate 80% of revenue?	1. Industrial Supply 2.Hose and Fitting 3.Fluid Power 4.Plumbing	
&nbsp;after sorting, how to get just top 10 rows of data?	abc.sort_values(ascending=False).round(1).head(10)	
What is top product group for Fluid Power profile?	28-PIPE-FIttings, brass	
product_group_id is associated with what column name in lookup table?	product_group_name	
what object returns with df.plot.pie()?	plot (probably matplotlib object)	
what is method to control legends?	plot.legend()	
what key,value pair is used to location of the legend?	"plot.legend(loc=""lower left"")"	
what key,value pair is used to location of the legend?	"plot.legend(loc=""lower left"")"	
what key,value is used to position legend?	"loc=""lower left"""	
"what key value is used for positioning legend in conjunction to loc=""lower left""?"	bbox_to_anchor=(1,1)	
how to get number of rows per column for DF?&nbsp;	DF.count()	
how to get dimension of DF?	DF.shape	
how to get number of rows of DF?	len(DF.index)	
how to time an execution?	e.g. timeit DF.shape	
which executes the fastest?&nbsp; DF.shape, DF[0].count(), len(DF.index)	len(DF.index)&nbsp; use timeit to measure.	
what is the difference between len(DF['abc']) and DF['abc'].map(len)?	First one gives the number of rows of the column and latter one gives the length of the data of in that column.&nbsp; e.g.&nbsp; 'qqqqq' will return 5.

python's data dictionary resembles which Cpp data structure?	Map	
Why array is called list in Python?	list can do insert() or append().	
how can you tell if index is unique with a DF?	DF.index.is_unique	
what does df.stack do?	Moves each column to a row.&nbsp; It becomes N by 1 dimensional table.	
How to return table back to original form after executing DF.stack?	DF.unstack	
when index is based on more than one index, what do you call it?	hierarchical index	
lets say 'stacked' is DF.&nbsp; You want to unstack it and view top rows. How do you do it?	stacked.unstacked().head()	
How set index based on 2 columns ('a', 'b')?	DF.set_index(['a', 'b'])	
what are 3 essentials when trying to pivot a table?	index='a', columns='b', values='c'	
when would you use pivot_table vs pivot?		
When would&nbsp; you use pivot vs pivot_table?	pivot_table would be used when applying aggfunc.&nbsp; e.g. aggfunc=max&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; df.pivot_table(rows=['site',treat'], cols='week', values='twstrs', aggfunc=max).head(20)	
lets say you want to count number of occurrences by columns 'a' and 'b' of df.&nbsp; How would you do it?	pd.crosstab(df.a, df.b)	
lets say you want to see frequency of a column called 'treat' of a DF called 'cdystonia'.	cdystonia.treat.value_counts()	
lets say you want to see frequency of a column called 'treat' of a DF called cdystonia.	cdystonia.treat.value_counts()	
		
lets say there is a column called 'treat'. The values are in string. the values are 'Placebo' and '5000U'.&nbsp; Need these values to be in integer 0 and 1 respectively. How do you do it?	1. treatment_map = {'Placebo':0, '5000U':1}<div>2. cdystonia['treament']=cdystonia.treat.map(treatment_map)</div>	
what is the returned value of cdystonia_grouped = cdystonia_groupby(cdystonia.patient)?&nbsp; Write a python script to read the value.	1. returned value is &lt;pandas.core.groupby.DataFrameGroupBy&gt;<div>2. for patient, group in cdystonia_grouped:</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;print patient</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;print group</div><div><br></div>	
if the df.groupby(df.column_name) is used, what is the key?	column_name	
Lets say df1_grouped_by = df.groupedby(df.col1). How do you get mean value of each columns?	df1_grouped_by.agg(mean)	
what is other way of writing df1_grouped_by.agg(mean)?	df1_grouped_by.mean()	
How would you rewrite df1_grouped_by.agg(mean) such that each column gets suffix '_mean'?	df1_grouped_by.agg(mean).add_suffix('_meand')	
lets say, you want to create mean value of a column called 'twstrs'.&nbsp; Instead of using df['twstrs'].mean(), what is another way writing it?	df['twstrs'].mean() is same as df['twstrs'].quantile(0.50)	
how to suppress scientific notation with describe()	df['extended_price'].describe().apply(lambda x: format(x,'f'))	
what key,value is needed such that no object is returned and the values change within the DF?	inplace=True	
Lets say datetime column 'startdate' is indexed.&nbsp; How can you create columns 'day, 'hour' and 'month' from this column?	df['month'] = df.index.month<div>df['day'] = df.index.day</div><div>df['hour'] = df.index.hour</div>	
How do you add rows of data to DF at initialization stage?	1.define columns = [&nbsp; &nbsp;]<div>2.define data_list = [ ]</div><div>3. define data_dict = { }</div><div>4. data_list.append(data_dict)</div><div><br></div><div>loop 3 and 4</div><div>5. DF = pd.DataFrame(data_list, columns=columns)</div>	
Can you append a dictionary data to existing DF? How?	1. Define data_dict = {&nbsp; &nbsp;}<div>2. DF.append( data_dict, ignore_index=True )</div><div>ignor_index=True means to continue indexing.</div>	
Can you assign a row of data in DF using DF.loc[i] where i is the index of the DF rows?	Yes.<div>DF.loc[i] = [ , , , , ]</div>	
How many ways you can add a row to DF?	1. DF.loc[i] = [&nbsp; &nbsp; ]<div>2. DF.append({&nbsp; &nbsp; })</div><div>3. Initializing DF</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp;a. Data_list = []</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp;b. Data_dict = {}</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp;c. Data_list.append(Data_dict)</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp;d. DF.DataFrame( Data_list, columns=columns)</div><div><br></div><div>Method 3 is the fastest.</div>	
if j is initialized as j = [].&nbsp; Can you assign via j[0] = ? Why or Why not?	Nope. j is type of&nbsp; List.&nbsp; This is not an array like PHP.&nbsp; The only way to assign this is j.append().	
for i in range(0,5):&nbsp; Wher is i going up to?	0,1,2,3,4	
What could be wrong with this error message: RuntimeWarning: invalid value encountered in true_divide	This error message can be caused by pssibly trying to divide NaN.	
How to drop a row of DataFrame?	Data_DF.drop([1,1])
